texts.en: Zahoor is a 52-year-old married woman and a mother of four. She is an active and talented lady who excels in the work of stitching. She has ten years of experience in this field and has gotten a lot of appreciation from her community. She wants to fulfill the needs of her family through all her hard work. One of her sons is shown in the photo, sitting with Zahoor. She requested a loan of PKR 15,000 to buy a new stitching machine with reels of thread, buttons and zippers in different colors to meet the increasing demand of her customers without delay. She dreams for her children's bright future and is thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to buy a new stitching machine with reels of thread, buttons and zippers in different colors

loans.name: Perveen

texts.en: Perveen is a 40-year-old married woman and the mother of eight children. She has been engaged in the business of stitching clothes for many years. She decided to start her business to contribute to the family's income. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. She is currently in her first loan cycle and has borrowed 20,000 PKR from Kashf. She intends to use this loan amount to buy sewing materials, such as spools of thread with packs of laces, buttons and zippers in different colors. In this way, she would be able to earn more by catering to her customers on time. She wishes to spend part of profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy sewing materials, such as spools of thread with packs of laces, buttons and zippers in different colors.

loans.name: Faiza

texts.en:
Ms Faiza is a 26-year-old married woman. She has three children. She is striving hard to meet their demands, including food, clothing, and health. Her husband is employed in a small restaurant. His income is not sufficient to meet the daily expenditures of the family. She started her business to contribute to the family income. She has been in the business of sewing for four years. She is well familiar with stitching techniques. 

She initiated her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. By that time she has attained many regular customers. In order to meet with the increasing demand of her customers, she requested a loan of Rs 25,000 to buy spools of thread with packs of needles, buttons, and zippers, etc. So then she would be able to meet the demands of her customers without fail. She is in her 2nd loan cycle. She hopes to grow her business and dreams of giving a good quality education to her children through all her hard work in her business.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread with packs of needles, buttons, and zippers, etc.

loans.name: Sadeeqan

texts.en: Sadeeqan, 54 years old, is a married woman and the mother of five. She had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband to support her family for a better future. Three years ago, she began glove stitching work in her house. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the demands of her customers. She contacted Kashf Foundation for the second time and has borrowed Rs 15,000 from Kashf. She intends to utilize this loan amount to buy bundles of wool, thread and needles to complete orders on time. In this way, she is able to handle her family's needs and requirements efficiently.

loans.use: to buy bundles of wool, thread and needles to complete orders on time.

loans.name: Paula Andrea

texts.es:
Paula Andrea a sus 20 años de edad se proyecta como una gran empresaria. Desde hace 7 meses decidió montar con su novio un almacén dedicado a la venta de accesorios, en el parque principal del municipio de Bello, Antioquia, Colombia. 

“Mi hijo es mi mayor motivación, la fuerza que me impulsa a salir adelante, y haber montado mi propio negocio me permite estar pendiente de él todo el tiempo”. Con estas palabras Paula explica de donde surge la idea de crear empresa. Asegura que su mayor sueño es poder consolidar su negocio para ofrecerle a su bebe de 18 meses una vida digna. Se encuentra solicitando un crédito para comprar una nueva línea de surtido y ampliar su portafolio de productos, esperando que las ventas se incrementen y puedan generar mayores ingresos que serán invertidos nuevamente en el negocio con la finalidad de consolidar su empresa.
texts.en:
Paula Andrea, 20, conducts herself like a great entrepreneur.  Seven months ago she and her boyfriend decided to set up a store to sell accessories in the main park in the town of Bello, Antioquia, Colombia.

"My son is my main motivation, the force that drives me to get ahead.  Having set up my own business allows me to pay attention to him all the time."  With these words Paula explains where she got the idea to create a business.  She's affirms that her biggest dream is to be able to strengthen her business so she can give her 18-month-old baby a decent life.

She's requesting a loan to buy a new line of stock and expand her product portfolio.  She's hoping sales will increase and generate greater income, which she'll invest again in her business with the goal of strengthening her endeavor.

loans.use: to buy a new line of earrings

loans.name: Jhonny

texts.es: Jhonny nació en la provincia Carrasco del departamento de Cochabamba, estudió hasta el bachillerato piensa continuar sus estudios una vez que sea solvente la producción que tiene, es soltero y no tiene hijos, desde niño ayuda a sus padres en la agricultura esto hace que tenga bastante experiencia en los cultivos que actualmente produce, hace 2 años que trabaja de forma independiente en una fracción de terreno que sus padres le regalaron para que pueda trabajarlo y así poder continuar sus estudios superiores, también se da un tiempo para poder ayudar a sus padres en su  parcela, el recorrido que hace cada día para ir de su casa a su parcela son de aproximadamente 5 kilómetros y lo hace caminando, es por eso que requiere un para poder comprarse una motocicleta, esto le facilitará su traslado y también le ayudara para el próximo año para poder trasladarse a la universidad.
texts.en:
Jhonny was born in the province of Carrasco in the department of Cochabamba.  He's single and has no children.  He studied up to the college level and plans to continue his studies once his production is solvent.

Since he was a little boy he has helped his parents in agriculture, which gives him a lot of experience with the crops he's currently growing.  He has worked on his own for two years on a piece of land his parents gave him so he could farm it and be able to continue with his advanced studies.  He also spends some time helping his parents on their land.

The trip he makes every day to go from his house to his plot of land is approximately five kilometers and he walks.  This is why he needs a loan to be able to buy himself a motorcycle to make his trip easier.  It also will help him be able to get to the university next year.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for transportation

loans.name: Uhuru Group

texts.en:
Julius,who is in his mid 40s, is single with a son who goes to school.  For one year, Julius has been earning a living by managing a business selling charcoal. He is doing fine. He works from 6am to 7pm daily, and he is able to earn a fair monthly profit.

This will be his second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to increase his sacks of charcoal and has paid back his loan successfully.  He is requesting a loan that he wants to use to buy more sacks of charcoal to resell to more customers. His dream is to one day be able to buy a plot of land, where he expects to build a house in the future.

Julius will share this loan with his loan group, "UHURU", which totals ten members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of charcoal to resell.

loans.name: Faraja Mavurunza Group

texts.en:
Jamila is married with three children (two boys and a girl) who are in school. She is in her mid 30s. For ten years now, Jamila has been running a food business. She is working hard and it shows. She works from 7am to 6pm daily and is able to earn a good profit per month.

This will be her 17th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to buy a plot of land, where she finished building her family house, bought more business inventory, and paid school fees and household expenses, and she has paid back all her loans successfully. She wants a loan to increase more on food stock items. Her dream is to one day be open another food business center. 

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Faraja Mavurunza", which has a total of 14 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase more on food stock items.

loans.name: Moyo Safi Group

texts.en:
Tuhuma is in her early 40s and is a widow with four children and two dependents who are the children of late relatives. She has been selling sarongs and fabrics door to door for 12 years now. She works from 8.00 am to 8.00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Tuhuma's fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to increase the sarongs and the fabrics that she sells, paid school fees, bought a TV, DVD player and deep freezer, repaired her house by making a smooth floor and painting all her rooms, and she has paid back all her loans successfully. She hopes for a new loan to buy more sarongs and fabrics to resell. Her dream is to one day be able to build a business premises and stop selling door to door.

She will share this loan with her loan group, "Moyo Safi", which has 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more sarongs and fabrics to resell.

loans.name: Sigara Group

texts.en:
Evalina, who is in her early 30s, is married with two daughters who are in school. For 10 years, Evalina has been earning a living by running a beauty salon business. She works from 8am to 8pm daily and she is able to make a good profit per month.

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to buy missing salon equipment. Her dream is to one day be able to be a well known businesswoman.

She will share this loan with her loan group, "SIGARA", which totals 19 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy missing salon equipment.

loans.name: Mwinyi Group

texts.en:
One member of Mwinyi group is Zainabu, who is in her early 30s and married, living together with her husband. For a period of three years, she has been able to manage her family by running a prepared food business. She works from 6am to 4pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

This will be her fourth loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to purchase more food stock, to repair the business premises, and to cover household expenses, and she has paid back all of her loans successfully. Now, she is requesting a loan to buy more food items. Her dream is to one day be able to build a house and own a cafe.

She will share this loan with her loan group, Mwinyi, which totals 12 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more food items to cook and sell.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Justina tiene 43 años de edad,04 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de vinos ,la socia vende de forma ambulatoria repartiendo los vinos a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez trabaja como guardián en uno de los colegios de la ciudad de Cusco, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería (vinos) para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla, located in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco.

Justina is 43 years old, and married with four children. She works as a tutor at one of the high schools in her city. In addition to her daily responsibilities, she has an ambulatory business selling wines. Each day, Justina distributes wine to her customers who ordered them. She has been working in this business for years and it has been very successful, thanks to the hard work she puts into it daily. She works both of these jobs at the same time in order to help her family get ahead. 

Justina is requesting this loan in order to buy merchandise (wines) for her business. She is very thankful for the loan and pledges to make her repayments punctually.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (wines) for her business.

loans.name: Tegemeo Group

texts.en:
Colleta is a member of Tegemeo Group. Colleta, who is in her early 30s, is married with three children who go to school. She has been running a food shop business since 2008. She works from 7am to 10pm daily and she is able to earn a good monthly profit.

This will be Colleta's 18th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loans to open her general store business, cover household expenses and school fees, and buy a television, DVD deck, bed, refrigerator, and sofa set. She has successfully paid back all her loans. 

Colleta is currently requesting a loan to buy and restock the missing food shop items. Her dream is to one day be able to build a house.

Colleta will share this loan with her loan group, Tegemeo Group, which totals 14 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy and restock items for her food shop.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to increase the business stock and pay school fees.

loans.name: Parachichi Group

texts.en:
Ezra, who is in his early 20s, is married. He has been running a shoe sales business since 2010. He works from 10am to 6:30pm daily and he is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be his first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which he wants to use to increase his business inventory in order to resell to more customers. His dream is to one day be able to build a house for his family.

He will share this loan with his loan group, "PARACHICHI", which totals 12 members. The members of the group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase business inventory in order to resell to more customers.

loans.name: José

texts.es: El señor José es soltero vive solo en el barrio Luis Soruco Barba zona de la villa 1ero mayo él es una persona sola y tiene un vehículo con el cual trabaja desde hace 10 años como taxista, en la casa que vive es propia y que se ha podido hacer con mucho esfuerzo y con sus propias manos por este caso la construcción es desigual en algunos cuartos,  el vehículo con el que trabaja es antiguo y necesita mantenimientos y reparaciones es por este motivo que el necesita el crédito para poder cambiar el motor y así hacerle algunos arreglos más y así poder trabajar tranquilo sin desperfectos mecánicos, y así poder trabajar sin sobresaltos, mejorando su calidad de vida, mejorando sus ingresos y así podrá tener una estabilidad económica para poder vivir mejor, el trabajo que realiza le ayudará a salir adelante en esta vida solitaria que tiene y la única forma es ayudando a su compañero de trabajo que es su herramienta de trabajo (su vehículo).
texts.en:
José is not married. He lives by himself in the neighborhood Luis Soruco Barba village, in the First of May area. He has worked for 10 years as a taxi driver. José owns his own house that he worked very hard to build himself. For this reason, the construction is uneven in some rooms of the house. The vehicle he works out of is old and needs some maintenance and repairs done. That is why he is requesting this loan.

José will use this loan to replace the engine of his vehicle and do some other reparations so that, in this way, he will be able to work in peace, without any mechanical breakdowns. He will be able to work more smoothly, improving his quality of life and increasing his earnings. This will give José financial stability and a better life. His truck is his work partner, and the repairs he does will help him to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy a new engine for his vehicle.

loans.name: Yanet

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Yanet  tiene 33 años de edad, 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como  arroz, azucar, leche, golosinas,gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia trabaja en su negocio de lunes a sábado durante el dia,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como gaseosas para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member, Yanet, belongs to Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla Communal Bank, located in the province of Cusco and department of Cusco.  She is 33 years old, has two children, and lives with her partner.

She balances her daily activities with her grocery store business.  She sells rice, sugar, milk, sweets, sodas, and other products.  She has been in this business for a long time and it's going well for her thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  She works in her business from Monday through Saturday during the day.  She's a responsible and diligent person, this being the way she gets her family ahead.

She's requesting the loan to buy merchandise such as soda for her business.

She's grateful for her loan and is committed to making her payments punctually.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as soda

loans.name: Lizbeth

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Lizbeth  tiene 19 años de edad, 01 hija y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de productos de belleza ella vende lo que son cremas,perfumes,colonias,entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio ,la socia a la vez se dedica a la crianza de pollos, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos a sus clientes que le solicitan, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería para su negocio como perfumes.

La socia sale en la foto con su hija.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Lizbeth belongs to the Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla Communal Bank, which is located in the province and department of Cusco. She is 19 years old and has one daughter and a live-in partner.

She alternates her daily activities with her business selling beauty products. She sells products such as creams, perfume, and cologne, among others. She has spent a good amount of time in this business, which is going well thanks to the effort she puts in every day. 

She also raises chickens at the same time, which she sells to her customers who order them. In this way, she is able to provide for her family.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy merchandise for her business, such as perfume.

In the photo above she is pictured with her daughter.

She is grateful for the loan which has been granted and committed to complying with the established quotas.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business, such as perfume.

loans.name: Karla Erica

texts.es: Érica es una persona joven dinámica y muy alegre, le gusta muchísimo trabajar, después de terminar el colegio sus padres le ingresaron a la Universidad Mayor de San Simón a la carrera de Ingeniería Comercial, pero no pudo concluir sus estudios porque está acostumbrada a viajar ya que siempre acompañaba a su padre, donde aprendió el negocio de la compra y venta. desde hace tres años Érica realiza la actividad del comercio de manera regular, donde compra arroz en época de cosecha para revenderlo durante el año, también comercia con azúcar, y por último con cemento, que lo vende a pobladores de San Julián, a Érica le gusta mucho trabajar y ganar su propio dinero, es por eso que con mucho esfuerzo está haciendo crecer su negocio, es por eso que  necesita el préstamo, para comprar más mercadería.
texts.en:
Érica is a dynamic and very happy young woman who greatly enjoys working. After finishing high school, her parents enrolled her in a business engineering degree at the Universidad Mayor de San Simón. However, she was not able to finish her studies because she is used to traveling. She always accompanied her father, which is how she learned about the business of buying and selling.

For three years, Érica has been working on a regular basis in trade. She buys rice during the harvest season and sells it throughout the year. She also trades sugar and cement, which she sells to the inhabitants of San Julián. She likes to work and earn her own money, which is why she is putting plenty of effort into growing her business. This is why she needs a loan to buy more merchandise.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SEÑOR DE LOS MILAGROS DE CHIMPAHUAYLLA, el banco está ubicado en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Marina tiene 43 años de edad, 02 hijos  y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de chicha y cerveza, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia vende todos los días en su negocio siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa ,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma poder seguir apoyando  a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como cerveza para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Marina belongs to the Señor de los Milagros de Chimpahuaylla Communal Bank, which is located in the province and department of Cusco. She is 43 years old and has two children and a live-in partner.

She alternates her daily activities with her business selling chicha (a drink made from corn) and beer. She has had this business for years, which is going well thanks to the effort which she puts in every day. She sells her products every day, and in this way she is able to provide for her family.

She is a responsible and persevering woman. She wishes to continue working to support her family.

She has applied for this loan to buy merchandise, such as beer, for her business.

She is grateful for the loan which has been granted and committed to complying with the established quotas.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, such as beer, for her business.

loans.name: Minka Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “MINKA”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.                                                                                                                                                                                             

La socia es la Sra. Lizbeth Giovana ella es conviviente y tiene 36 años y tiene 1 hijo; La socia trabaja en su negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,leche y aceite, la socia también vende cerveza y gaseosas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 9 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,en sus tiempos libres a la socia le gusta salir a pasear, el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar arroz, aceite, leche y azúcar y también cervezas y gaseosas.
El socio que esta pegado a la foto grupal se le tomo despues de la reunion la foto porque pidio permiso por motivos de trabajo.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de celulares, negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes, negocio de venta de artesanías y negocio de venta de comida.

 
La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
The members belong to the communal bank “MINKA”. This bank is located in the district of Cusco in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.
Lizbeth Giovana is a cohabitant and is 36 years old with one child. She works in her grocery store business. She sells staple products like rice, sugar, milk and oil. She also sells beer and soft drinks. She works from 8am to 7pm. She has been in this business for nice years, and it is going well for her. In her free time, she likes to go out for walks. Her dream is to expand her grocery store business. She is requesting the loan to buy rice, oil, milk, sugar and also beer and soft drinks.
The other members have businesses selling cell phones, groceries, handicrafts and food. The small photo is of a member who came after the group photo was taken because of work committments. 
Lizbeth Giovana is grateful to those that form part of this dream through this medium, and she commits to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, milk, sugar and also beer and soft drinks.

loans.name: Jose Yovany

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 43 años de edad, vive con su  esposo, tiene 4 hijos, su actividad principal es la venta de gasolina, tiene más de 4 años de dedicarse a esta actividad.
Don José ésta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de gasolina superior y diesel, es una persona muy trabajadora, esta actividad le deja buenos ingresos porque con el paso del tiempo la comunidad ha crecido y no hay otra gasolinera cerca.
Don José tiene como clientes a muchas personas de la comunidad y de la montaña, también tiene como cliente a personas que tienen motocicletas, es muy querido en la las personas y participa en las actividades para ayudar a su comunidad. Con la ayuda del préstamo que reciba le contribuirá a tener un mejor negocio. 
Don José el sueña con tener un establecimiento más grande para la venta de combustible, para poder mejorar sus ingresos y salir adelante con  su familia.


Danlí, Honduras - Noviembre 2012
texts.en:
Jose, 43 years old, lives with his wife and four children. His main work is in gasoline sales, which he has been working in for over four years.

José is requesting a loan to buy premium gasoline and diesel. He is a very hard-working person, and this job provides him good income because over time, the community has grown and there is not another gas station nearby.

José has many customers from the community and from the mountain. He also has customers who drive motorcycles. He is loved among the people and he participates in activities to help his community. This loan will help contribute to José having a better business.

José dreams of having a larger establishment to sell fuel so that he can have more income and move forward with his family.

Danlí, Honduras - November 2012

loans.use: to buy premium gasoline and diesel for his business

loans.name: Pamela Jessica

texts.es: Pamela muy joven tuvo un hijo quien es el principal motor de impulso en su vida, por lo que se esmera trabajando para poder dar a su hijo todo lo que necesita, vive en la casa de sus padres, quienes colaboran a Pamela con el cuidado del niño cuando ella tiene que salir a entregar productos o cobrar de los mismos. Desenvuelve su actividad comercial, vendiendo productos por medio de catálogos, ya tiene una gran cartera de clientes quienes la conocen y por su puntualidad en la entrega de los productos la llaman para pedirle otros. Lleva con esta actividad 10 años, y en este tiempo aprendió sobre los productos, y también sobre clientes, asimismo sabe hacia donde dirigirse para vender los perfumes, cosméticos, etc. Necesita del crédito para abastecer su negocio pues en Navidad tiene mayor demanda en sus pedidos, por lo que sus ventas mejoran y con ello también sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Pamela had a son when she was still quite young.  Her son is the most important driving force in her life.  She puts a lot of effort into her work in order to be able to give her son everything he needs.  She lives with her parents, who help care for her son when she needs to go out to deliver products or collect accounts.  She runs her business very well, selling products by catalog to a large group of customers.  Her customers know her for her punctual delivery of products, which is why they call her with additional orders.  She has been in this business for 10 years, during which time she has learned about the products, the customers and where best to direct her efforts to sell perfume and cosmetics, etc.

Pamela is requesting a loan to supply her business for the large number of orders she receives at Christmas.  In this way she will increase her sales and income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as perfume and cosmetics.

loans.name: Kenny Rogers

texts.es:
El Joven Kenny de 30 años de edad, es casado y tiene dos hijos que dependen de él, tiene casa propia, vive con su esposa en la ciudad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, sus hijos tiene edades entre 05 años y 01 año, el se dedica al negocio de pulpería en la que vende todo lo relacionado a la canasta familiar, sus clientes le prefieren porque ahí encuentran de todo para uso familiar, también vende ricos refrescos, de toda las clases y sabores.
Kenny es un joven emprendedor que está luchando con su negocio ya que el tenia un empleo el cual fue despedido, y al ver la necesidad que tenía de salir adelante con su familia emprendió este negocio y le va bien. 
Kenny está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra de arroz, azúcar, café, frijoles, pan, galletas, salsas, pastas, pollo, frescos, cosméticos, medicinas, café ,mantequilla, etc. ya que la demanda es muy buena y desea aprovechar esta época para comprar al por mayor el producto y lograr de esa manera más utilidades, está muy contento de seguir trabajando con Prisma.
 Kenny su sueño es mejorar  su casa y su negocio.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Kenny is a young adult, 30 years old, married and has two dependent children, his own house, and lives with his wife in the city of San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras. His children are between the ages of 5 years and 1 year. He has a grocery store business where he sells everything related to household goods. His customers prefer him because there they find everything the family uses, and he also sells delicious soft drinks of all kinds and flavors.

Kenny is a young entrepreneur who is struggling with his business because he had a job but lost it, and upon seeing the need to get ahead with his family he started this business and it’s going well.

Kenny is asking for a loan in order to buy rice, sugar, coffee, beans, bread, cookies, sauces, pastas, chicken, beverages, cosmetics, medicines, butter, etc. as the demand is very good and he wants to take advantage this season to buy the product at wholesale in order to get a better profit. He is very happy to continue working with Prisma.

Kenny’s dream is to improve his home and his business.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, coffee, beans, bread, cookies, sauces, pastas, chicken, beverages, cosmetics, medicines, butter, etc. for his business

loans.name: Marlit Kari

texts.es:
La socia Marli Kari se dedica al negocio de venta de productos de belleza como lapiz labiales.cremas y perfumes,la socia tambien trabaja como profesora,la socia los productos de belleza lo vende en forma independiente llevando a diferentes lugares como amigos,la socia se dediac a este negocio 6 años y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un lugar donde pueda vender los productos de belleza.La socia solicita el credito para comprar lapiz labiales,cremas y perfumes.

La socia esta contenta con el credito y se compromete a pagar los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Member Marlit Kari has a business selling beauty products, such as lip pencils, creams and perfumes. She is also a teacher.  She sells her products by taking them to various places, such as to friends. She has had this business for six years and it has been going well. Her dream is to have her own venue where she can sell her beauty products. Marlit is requesting the loan to purchase lip pencils, creams and perfumes.

The member is pleased about the loan and is committed to making all of her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase lip pencils, creams and perfume.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Gladys  tiene 29 años de edad, 01 hijo  y es separada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción como cemento, bloquetas, ladrillos  entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cemento para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Gladys belongs to the communal bank Munay Soncco. The bank is located in the San Jerónimo District in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco. Gladys, 29, has one child and is separated. She alternates her daily activities with selling construction materials like cement, cinderblocks, and bricks, among others. She has been working in this business for several years. It is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She is a responsible person, this being the way in which she advances her family. She is applying for the loan to buy cement for her business. She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement for her business.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia María  tiene 35  años de edad, 03 hijos  y es separada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de comida, la socia vende  de forma ambulatoria en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracia al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz, aceite, menestras  entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Maria belongs to the Munay Soncco communal bank. The bank is located in the San Jerónimo District in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco. Maria, 35, is separated and has three children. She alternates her daily activities with selling food. She sells as a street vendor in one of the markets in the city of Cusco. She has worked in this business for years. It is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She is applying for the loan to buy ingredients for her business, like rice, oil, and dried vegetables, among others. She feels grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business, such as rice, oil, and dried vegetables, among others.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
La señora Martha de 42  años de edad es soltera, tiene  dos hijos  que dependen de ella, vive en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, vive en casa de un familiar, y se dedica desde hace 25 años al negocio de venta de tortillas, sus clientes le prefieren por su amabilidad y buen servicio ya que atiende a sus clientes desde las seis de la mañana hasta las siete de la noche. 
Doña Martha es una mujer trabajadora y muy sufrida y su deseo es sacar adelante a su familia y su negocio.
Doña Martha está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de materia prima como es  la leña, maíz y cal, con el apoyo del préstamo espera tener más producto para ofrecer a sus clientes, en esta época en donde se vende bastante la tortilla, está muy contenta de seguir teniendo préstamo con Prisma. 
Doña Martha su sueño es tener su propia casa.

 San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Martha is 42 years old, single, and has two children that depend on her. She lives in the San Lorenzo community in southern Honduras. She lives in the home of a family member. She has been in the business of selling tortillas for 25 years. Her customers prefer her for her kindness and good service. She serves her customers from 6 in the morning until 7 in the evening.

Martha is a very hardworking and tough woman. Her desire is to more forward with her family and her business.

Martha is requesting a loan in order to buy raw materials like firewood, corn and lime. With the support of this loan, she hopes to have more product to offer her clients in the season that she sells many tortillas. She is very happy to continue taking loans from Prisma.

Martha's dream is to have her own home.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn and lime for her business.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Beatriz  tiene 28 años de edad, 02 hijos  y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como  arroz, azucar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia trabaja en su negocio de lunes a sábado durante el dia,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como gaseosas para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the group MUNAY SONCCO. The group is located in the district of San Jerónimo, in the province of Cusco, in the district of Cusco.

The partner Beatriz is 28 years old, is married, and has two children. The partner alternates her daily activities with the grocery store business. The partner sells different types of products, like, rice, sugar, milk, candy, soft drinks and others. 

The partner has a good time with this business, which is doing well thanks to the commitment she puts in every day. The partner works in her business during the day Monday to Saturday. The partner is a responsible and tenacious person; this is how she will bring her family forward.

The partner is requesting a loan in order to buy merchandise like soft drinks for her business.

The partner feels grateful for the loan and promises to comply with the established terms.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Julia  tiene 26 años de edad, 02 hijos  y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción como cemento, bloquetas, ladrillos  entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día  su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia sale en la foto con una de sus hijas.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cemento para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Munay Soncco" located in the district of San Jeronimo in the province and department of Cusco. 

The member Julia is 26 years old, has two children and is in a committed relationship. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling construction materials such as cement, small blocks, and bricks among other items. She has had this business for years and it is going well for her, thanks to the dedication she shows to her business every day. The member is a responsible person and in this way gets her family ahead. 

The photograph was taken of the member and one of her daughters. The member is seeking the loan to purchase cement for her business. She feels grateful for the loan she has been given and promises to make the required payments.

loans.use: to purchase cement for her business.

loans.name: Yessenia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Yesenia  tiene 24 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de pan, la socia cuenta con un horno donde elabora diferentes tipos de panes para luego distribuirlo a sus clientes que le solicitan, a la vez la socia es estudiante de la carrera de contabilidad, siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante. 
La socia solicita el crédito para pagar sus estudios de la universidad.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The partner belongs to the group MUNAY SONCCO. The group is located in the San Jerónimo district, in the province of Cusco, in the district of Cusco.

The partner Yesenia is 24 years old and single. The partner alternates her daily activities with her bread selling business. The partner relies on an oven where she prepares different types of bread, then distributes the orders to her customers. At the same time, the partner is studying to become an accountant; this is how she plans to move forward.

The partner is requesting a loan in order to pay for her university studies.

The partner feels grateful for the loan and promises to comply with the established terms.

loans.use: to pay for her university studies.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
El señor Pablo  de 44 años de edad, es casado tiene 01 hijo que dependen de él, vive en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia, y se dedica desde hace 16 años al negocio de venta de ropa deportiva  e implementos, también vende ropa de caballero, zapatos de trabajo y zapato juvenil, sus clientes le prefieren por su variedad de calzado y más.
Don Pablo es un hombre trabajador y con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de zapatos deportivos, tenis, camisas y calzonetas, tiene varios pedidos de sus clientes que pertenecen a un equipo de fútbol de su comunidad, está solicitando el préstamo por la cantidad de 10,000.00 lempiras para capital de trabajo ya que se acerca la época de navidad y desea surtir mas su negocio y por ende tener buenas ganancias.
Don Pablo con el apoyo del préstamo espera salir adelante y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
 Don Pablo su sueño es mejorar su negocio.

 San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Mr. Pablo, 44, is married and has one dependent child. He lives in the community of San Lorenzo in the southern part of Honduras. He has his own home and devotes himself to selling sporting goods which he has done for 16 years. He also sells men's clothing, work shoes and children's shoes. His customers prefer him on account of the variety of footwear and other items he offers. 

Don Pablo is a hardworking man with a strong desire to get ahead. He is seeking the loan to purchase sports shoes, tennis shoes, T-shirts and shorts. He has a number of orders from customers who belong to a soccer club in the community. He is seeking the loan in the amount of 10,000 lempiras as working capital since the Christmas season is approaching and he wishes to stock up his business and so make good earnings. 

Don Pablo hopes to use the loan to get ahead and improve his and his family's quality of life. His dream is to improve his business. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: to purchase sports shoes, tennis shoes, T-shirts and shorts for his business.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
El señor Pablo  de 68  años de edad, es casado  no tiene  hijos  que dependen de él, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia, y se dedica desde hace 10 años al negocio de venta de hamacas, lazos. Su venta la realiza  de forma ambulante  y también vende churros, frescos y pan en su casa con la ayuda de su esposa.
Don Pablo sale a los caseríos y a las ciudades en bus a visitar a sus clientes en pulperías y personas a quienes  les lleva hamacas y lazos para vender.
Don Pablo está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de lazos, hamacas, refrescos, churros y pan porque tiene varios pedidos de sus clientes para esta época, con el apoyo del préstamo el espera salir  adelante y resolver su necesidad de financiamiento para el negocio.
Don Pablo está muy contento de seguir trabajando con Prisma, y su sueño es mejorar su casa.

 San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Mr. Pablo, 68, is married and has no dependent children. He lives in the community of San Lorenzo in the southern part of Honduras. He has his own home and for ten years has earned a living with the business of selling hammocks and rope. He works as a traveling salesman and also sells churros, drinks and bread out of his home with the help of his wife. 

Don Pablo goes out to the hamlets and cities by bus to visit his customers in grocery stories and other people for whom he brings hammocks and rope for sale. He is seeking the loan for the purchase of rope, hammocks, drinks, churros and bread since he has a number of seasonal orders from his customers. With the support of the loan he hopes to get ahead and resolve his need for financing for the business. 

Don Pablo is very happy to keep working with Prisma and his dream is to make improvements to his home. 

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: to purchase rope, hammocks, drinks, churros and bread for his business.

loans.name: Ruth Marise

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Ruth tiene 19 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de productos de belleza como cremas, perfumes, colonias entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez está estudiando en una pre universitaria para presentarse a la universidad la carrera de contabilidad ,la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante.
La socia solicita el crédito para pagar sus estudios del pre universitario.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Munay Soncco. The bank is located in the district of San Jerónimo in the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco.

The member, Ruth, is 19 years old and single. She alternates her daily activities with her business of selling beauty products such as cream, perfumes, and colognes among others. She has been in business for some time and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts in each day to her business. At the same time she is studying at a pre-university in order to present herself at university to study for an accounting degree.

She is a responsible person and this is how she is able to get ahead. She is asking for a loan to pay for her pre-university school fees.

She is grateful for the loan provided and she promises to make her payments according to plan.

loans.use: to pay for her pre-university fees to continue her studies

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
La señora Martina  de 52  años de edad es madre soltera, tiene 01 hijo  que depende de ella  su hijo tiene 10 años, vive en una comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, tiene casa propia  y se dedica desde hace 15  años  al negocio de venta de tortillas en su casa.
Doña Martina atiende a mas de 40 clientes que llegan todos los días a comprar las tortillas, es una mujer sola, trabajadora que ha tenido  que luchar mucho para sacar adelante a su familia y es un ejemplo en la comunidad de que si se puede salir adelante.
Doña Martina está solicitando el préstamo para la  compra leña, maíz, cal, es la materia prima para elaborar las tortillas, con el apoyo de este préstamo ella pretende mejorar sus ingresos y con las ganancias obtenidas desea seguir trabajando y mejorando su casa.
Doña Martina su sueño es mejorar su casa y sus negocios.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012.
texts.en:
Martina, 52, is a single mother. She has a ten-year-old son who depends on her. She lives in a community in San Lorenzo, in the south of Honduras. She has her own house, and has worked for 15 years selling tortillas in her home. Martina sees more than 40 customers who come every day to buy tortillas. She is a single women, and a hard worker who has had to fight to advance her family. She is an example in the community that, yes, it is possible to move forward. Martina is applying for a loan to buy firewood, corn, and lime. These are the raw materials to make the tortillas. With the help of this she intends to increase her income and with the earnings she wants to keep working and improving her house. Her dream is to improve her home and her businesses.

San Lorenzo, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: to buy firewood, corn, and lime for her business.

loans.name: Eduardina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Eduardina tiene 23 años de edad ,02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de salchipapas, la socia vende en la puerta de su casa en una carreta especial para este tipo de negocio, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia a la vez realiza llamadas telefónicas tanto nacionales como locales, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para sus insumos para su negocio como papas, aceite entre otros.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank Munay Soncco.  The bank is located in the San Jerónimo District of Cusco Province, Cusco Department.

Eduardina is 23 years old, has two children and lives with her partner.  She alternates her daily activities with her business selling "salchipapas" (hotdogs and fries).  She sells her products out front of her home from a cart specially designed for this type of business.  She has been in this business for years, and it has been going well thanks to the effort she puts into it every day.  In addition, Eduardina handles telephone calls, both national and local.  That is another way she helps to get her family ahead. 

Eduardina is requesting the loan to purchase supplies for her business, like potatoes, cooking oil and other items. 

Eduardina is grateful for the loan that has been offered and promises to comply wit her established repayment plan.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her business, like potatoes, cooking oils and other items.

loans.name: Marisa Olinda

texts.es:
La socia Marisa Olinda se dedica al trabajo como profesora de educacion,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia ya tiene 6 años en este trabajo y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es terminar de construir su casa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar materiales de construccion como cemento,arena y yeso.

La socia esta contenta con el credito y se compromete a cumplir los pagos.
texts.en:
Marisa Olinda makes a living as a professor of education.  She works from 8am until 6pm.  She has been working in this job for six years and it is going very well.  Her dream is to finish constructing her house.  She is requesting a loan to buy construction materials like cement, sand, and plaster.

She is happy with the loan and promises to pay her installments.

loans.use: to buy construction materials, like cement, sand, and plaster.

loans.name: Neri

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal” VILCANOTA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco. La socia es la Sra. Neri; la socia tiene 45 años de edad, soltera y tiene 4 hijos; la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes ella vende lo que son productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar y leche también vende otro tipo de productos como golosinas,gaseosas,aceite,fideos entre otros, la socia lleva ya un buen tiempo en este negocio el cual trabaja conjuntamente con su cuñada, la socia es una persona bien alegre y con muchas ganas de salir adelante por sus hijos que son lo más importante que ella tiene. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar de más mercadería para la tienda de abarrotes como arroz,azucar,leche y aceite. 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Vilcanota communal bank. The bank is located in the Urubamba district, which is in the Urubamba area, in the Cusco region.

Her name is Neri and she is 45 years old. She is not married and has 4 children. 

She divides her time between daily chores and the grocery store where she sells basic necessities, such as rice, sugar and milk, as well as other products, such as sweets, carbonated drinks, cook oil and pasta etc. She has been running this business for a long time. She runs the business with her sister-in-law.

She is a happy person and really wants to do well for her children who are the most important thing in her life. She is requesting this loan to buy stocks of goods, such as rice, sugar, milk and cooking oil, for her grocery shop. 

She is happy to have the opportunity to request this loan and promises to honour all the payments.

loans.use: to buy stock for her grocery store, such as rice, sugar, milk and cooking oil

loans.name: Mirian Elizabeth

texts.es:
La socia Miriam tiene 20 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de compra y venta de papa, la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de papas al por mayor para su negocio.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Miriam is twenty years old and is single.  She alternates her daily activities between tasks in her business of buying and selling potatoes.  She sells in one of the markets in the city of Cusco.  She has a good time in this business and it's going well thanks to the effort that she puts into her business every day.

She is a responsible person and feels that in this way, she will continue moving forward.  She is requesting a loan to buy potatoes wholesale for her business.  

She is thankful for the loan granted to her and promises to comply with the established installments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes wholesale for her business.

loans.name: Katty

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Katty  tiene 24 años de edad y es soltera, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de productos secos ,la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, a la vez la socia estudia la carrea de contabilidad en una de las universidades de la ciudad de Cusco, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante.
La socia solicita el crédito para sus estudios de la universidad.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Katty belongs to the communal bank MUNAY SONCCO.  The bank is located in the district of San Jerónimo, in the province of Cusco and division of Cusco.  

Katty is twenty-four years old and is single.  She alternates her daily activities between tasks in her business of selling dried products.  She sells in one of the markets in Cusco.  She has been working in this business for years and everything is going well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day.  

Simultaneously, she is studying accounting at one of the universities in the city of Cusco.  She is a responsible and determined person and feels that in being this way, she continues to move forward.

She requests a loan to pay for her studies at the university.  She feels thankful for the loan granted to her and promises to comply with the set installments.

loans.use: to pay for her studies at the university.

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal MUNAY SONCCO, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Jerónimo  en la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
El socio Marco Antonio tiene 24 años de edad y es soltero, el socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de compra y venta de productos secos, el socio distribuye su mercadería a sus clientes que más le solicitan ,el socio lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, a  la vez el socio es estudiante de la carrera profesional de electrónica en una de las universidades de la ciudad de Cusco, él socio es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que el socio sale adelante.
El socio solicita el crédito para sus estudios de la universidad.
El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Marco Antonio belongs to the Munay Soncco communal bank. The bank is located in the San Jeronimo District in Cusco Province, Department of Cusco. Marco Antonio is 24 and single. He alternates his daily activities with his business of buying and selling dry goods. He distributes his merchandise to the customers who request it the most. He has been in this business for some time, and it is going well for him thanks to the effort that he puts into it eery day. At the same time, he is studying a degree in electronics at one of the universities in Cusco. He is a responsible person, and this is how he moves forward. He is applying for the loan for his university studies. He is grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for his university education.

loans.name: Olimpia

texts.es: El medio de sobrevivencia de doña Olimpia sigue siendo su pequeña pulpería  que le ha ayudado a sacar adelante a todos sus hijos quienes ya son mayores de edad y ahora ellos le apoyan a su mama, los créditos los utiliza en productos para su negocio y también con las ganancias invierte en mejora de infraestructura de su casa, ella está muy contenta con los avances que ha obtenido por medio de Kiva y Afodenic y con este 14vo préstamo comprara granos básicos, enlatados productos de limpieza, lácteos, carnes entre otros para mantener siempre su negocio.
texts.en:
Olimpia runs a small grocery store for survival. It has supported her while she raised her two grown children, and now, it supports her mother.

The loan will be used for products for her business. The profits are invested in improving the infrastructure of her home. She is very happy with the progress that has been made with the help of Kiva and Afodenic.

With this 14th loan, she will buy basic grains, cleaning products, dairy, meats, and other products to maintain her business.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, cleaning products, dairy, meat, and other products.

loans.name: Elsa Marina

texts.es:
La señora Elsa tiene 45 años de edad, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, vive con sus hijas y su esposo quien le apoyan en su actividad comercial.
Doña Elsa su negocio es pulpería, actividad que realiza desde hace 16 años en la comunidad  donde vive. Su negocio se encuentra en un punto estratégico,  porque está en el centro de la aldea  y esto hace que tenga una fuerte demanda de cada uno de sus clientes, los cuales la visitan a diario. 
Doña Elsa el crédito lo necesita para la compra de maíz, frijoles, arroz, carnes, embutidos, refrescos, leches, quesos, mantequilla, margarinas, salsas, cubitos, pastas, tarjetas de teléfono etc. Espera con el crédito satisfacer la demanda de cada uno de sus clientes, debido a la calidad de sus productos tiene mucha demanda a diario. 
Doña Elsa sus planes a futuro es seguir creciendo en su actividad día a día y  llegar a tener una mercadito,  que le genere mejores ingresos para tener una  mejor calidad de vida con su familia.



Choluteca, Honduras - Noviembre del 2012
texts.en:
Elsa is 45 years old. She lives in the southern zone of Honduras. She lives with her two daughters, which she supports with her commercial activities.

Elsa's business is a grocery store, an activity she has done for 16 years in the community where she lives. Her business is located in a strategic place, because it is in the center of the village. This means it is in high demand from her customers, who visit daily.

Elsa needs this loan to buy corn, beans, rice, meats, sausages, sodas, milk, cheeses, butter, margarine, salsas, ice cubes, pastas, phone cards, etc. She hopes that with this loan she will be able to meet the demand of each of her customers, due to the quality of the products and their high demand on a daily basis.

Elsa's plans for the future are to continue growing in her day to day activities and to have a small market that will generate more income in order to provide a better quality of life for her family.

Choluteca, Honduras - November, 2012

loans.use: to buy products for her business, such as corn, beans and rice.

loans.name: Estrellas De Fatima Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Estrellas de Fátima” que conforman 10 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 15. Lucia tiene 45 años, conviviente con 01 hijo, lleva 3 años en el grupo. Lucia se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva en su domicilio cuenta con clientes fidelizados. Lucia solicito el préstamo para la compra de pantalón jean, polos, short y medias. Su sueño es ampliar más su negocio para poder atender mejor a sus clientes. Lucia está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Edaprospo y a Kiva. Lucia se encuentra ubicada en la parte de atrás es la primera del lado izquierdo, viste polo manga larga guinda con pantalón marrón.
texts.en:
This is the Estrellas de Fátima group that is made up of 10 members who work in various business activities who are in the fifteenth cycle. 

Lucia is 45 years old, cohabiting with one son. She has been a member of the group for three years. Lucia sells new clothing in her home to her loyal customers. Lucia is asking for a loan in order to buy blue jeans, polos, shorts and socks. Her dream is to expand her business in order to assist her clients better. 

Lucia is very happy for this loan and grateful to Edaprospo and to Kiva. 

Lucia can be found in the back and is the first on the left side, wearing a long-sleeved cherry-red polo with brown pants.

loans.use: to buy blue jeans, polos, shorts and socks for her home based clothing sale business.

loans.name: Yesenia

texts.es:
La señora Yesenia tiene 39 años, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, con ella viven sus 3 hijos y su esposo, quien también es comerciante y le ayuda en esta actividad.
Doña Yesenia su negocio lo hace de manera ambulante, distribuye su producto en diferentes ciudades de Honduras, como también fuera del país. El crédito lo necesita para la compra de pescado seco, buche de pescado, atún, bagre, etc. y así satisfacer las necesidades de cada uno de sus clientes. 
Doña Yesenia espera que con el financiamiento, sus ventas crezcan, ya que comprara una fuerte variedad de producto, y de esta manera satisfacer un poco sus necesidades y las de su familia. 
Doña Yesenia sus planes a futuro, es seguir creciendo en su negocio, y también poder darles una mejor educación a sus hijos para que sean personas de bien.



Choluteca, Honduras – Noviembre del 2012
texts.en:
Yesenia, 39 years old, lives in the southern region of Honduras. She lives with her three children and her husband, who works as a merchant and she helps in this work.

Yesenia has a traveling business, in which she distributes her product to different cities in Honduras and out of the country. She needs this loan to buy dried fish, and fish, tuna, and catfish parts to satisfy her customers' needs. Yesenia hopes that with this loan, her sales will grow because she will buy a large variety of products. This way, she will satisfy her family's needs.

Yesenia's plans for the future are to continue to grow her business and to give her children a better education so that they will be good people.

Choluteca, Honduras - November 2012

loans.use: to buy dried fish, and fish, tuna, and catfish parts for her business

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: La  Señora Juana tiene 39 años de edad, casada con el Sr. Juan tienen 2 hijos menores dependientes uno estudia y el otro todavía, viven en Sacaba zona Nueva Canaán la actividad económica está en la comunidad de San Isidro a 36 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, Doña Juana se dedica a fabricar colchones de paja en la misma comunidad, los colchones vende en la feria semanal de Colomi, Sacaba también hace pedidos, Doña Juana es una persona humilde trabajadora, necesita dinero para ampliar su negocio de colchones, y ampliar su negocio. Doña Juana quiere ampliar el negocio de colchones porque tiene mucha demanda, el ahorro que tenía gasto en la curación de su esposo que sufrió un accidente en el trabajo, ella seguirá trabajando por sus dos hijos hasta que terminen sus estudios superiores.
texts.en: Juana, 39 years old, is married to Juan and they have two dependent children. One of the children is in school. They live in Sacaba, Nueva Canaán. Her work is in the community of San Isidro, which is 36km from the city of Cochabamba. Juana works by manufacturing straw mattresses here.The mattresses are sold at the weekly market in Colomi. Orders also come from Sacaba. Juana is a humble worker. She needs money to grow her mattress business. Juana wants to grow the business because there is a high demand. Her savings have been spent on her husband's recovery from when he suffered from a work accident. Juana will continue working for her two children until they complete their higher educations.

loans.use: to buy supplies for mattress production

loans.name: Lety Azucena

texts.es:
La señora Lety tiene 34 años, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, con su hijo y su esposo quien la ayuda en su actividad.
Doña Lety su negocio se encuentra en un punto estratégico, donde la fluidez de personas es en grandes cantidades, ya que esta a orilla de la calle principal y esto hace que sea muy visitado. 
Doña Lety necesita el préstamo para la compra de carnes, refrescos, leches, mantequilla, quesos, margarina, azúcar, frijoles,  mariscos, arroz,  aceite, verduras etc. Espera poder satisfacer a sus clientes y obtener buenas utilidades con la compra de estos productos que le permitan mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia. 
Doña Lety su plan a futuro, es seguir trabajando día a día en su actividad comercial,y que su negocio sea una de los mejores de su región, como también poder seguir apoyando a su familia. 



Choluteca, Honduras - Noviembre del 2012.
texts.en:
Señora Lety is 34 years old.  She lives in the south of Honduras with her son, who helps her with her store. 
Doña Lety's store is in a strategic location, where large numbers of people flow by.  She is located right at the edge of a main road, which brings in a lot of customers.  
Doña Lety needs the loan to purchase meats, sodas, milk, butter, cheese, margarine, sugar, beans, shellfish, cooking oil, vegetables etc.  She hopes that the purchase of these supplies will satisfy her customers and give her a good profit, which would allow her and her family a bit better quality of life. 
Doña Lety's future plan is to continue working in her store day after day so that her business can be one of the best in the region.  She also plans to continue supporting her family.  



Choluteca, Honduras - November 2012.

loans.use: with the purchase of meats, sodas, milk, butter, cheese, margarine, sugar, beans, shellfish, rice, cooking oil, vegetables etc. for her business

loans.name: Karla

texts.es:
La joven Karla tiene 22 años de edad, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, junto con ella viven su hijo y su madre quien le apoya en el crecimiento de su actividad comercial.
Karla  su negocio es venta de tortillas, actividad que realiza desde hace 3 años en su comunidad donde vive. Su negocio se encuentra en un punto estratégico  ya que esta en el centro de la ciudad  y esto hace que sea muy visitado por su clientes.  
Karla el crédito lo necesita para la compra de maíz, leña y cal. Espera que con el crédito sus ventas se incremente y poder satisfacer de esta manera la demanda de sus clientes, los cuales la visitan a diario. 
Karla los planes a futuro es seguir creciendo en su actividad  y comprar una maquina de hacer tortillas, de igual manera generarse mejores ingresos para darle una buena educación a su hijo y tener una mejor calidad de vida.



Choluteca, Honduras - Noviembre del 2012
texts.en:
The young Karla is 22 years old. She lives in the southern zone of Honduras. Living with her are her son and her mother, who helps her in the growth of her business.

Karla's business is selling tortillas, a business that she has had for three years in the community where she lives. Her business is located at a strategic point, since it is in the center of the city, and this makes it much visited by her customers.

Karla needs the loan to buy cornmeal, firewood, and lime. She hopes that with the loan her sales will grow and in this way she will be able to satisfy the demands of her customers, who visit her daily.

Karla's future plans are to continue growing in her business and to buy a machine that makes tortillas, and in the same way to generate better income to give a good education to her son and to have a better quality of life.

Choluteca, Honduras. November 2012.

loans.use: to buy cornmeal, firewood, and lime for her business.

loans.name: Los Portales De Pariachi Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Los Portales de Pariachi” que conforman 08 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio, la gran mayoría de ellos vecinos de la zona que pasan al ciclo 11. America tiene 31 años, soltera, lleva 01 año en el grupo. America tiene un puesto donde se dedica hace más de 01 año a la venta de ropa nueva y ayuda con los gastos del hogar. Actualmente vive junto con sus padres. America solicitó el préstamo para mejorar su puesto de trabajo, para la compra de polos, bibiri y pantalón jeans. Su sueño es de tener ampliar su tienda para atender mejor a sus clientes. Esta agradecida con los inversionistas Kiva por permitirle seguir creciendo su negocio. America se encuentra en la parte de atrás es la cuarta del lado derecho, viste polo verde y chompa azul.
texts.en: This is the "Portales de Pariachi" group, comprising 8 friends who are dedicated to different business activities. The large majority of members are neighbors, and this is their 11th loan cycle. America is 31 years old, single, and has been a group  member for one year. For more than a year, she has a stand where she has sold new clothes to help with household expenses. She lives together with her parents. America is asking for this loan to improve her clothing stand by purchasing polo shirts, tank tops, and jeans to sell. Her dream is to expand her business to be able to better serve her customers.  America is grateful to Kiva lenders for allowing her to continue to grow her business. In the photo, America is in the back row, fourth person from the left side. She is wearing a green polo shirt and a blue sweater.

loans.use: to purchase polo shirts, tank tops, and jeans for her business.

loans.name: Jose Geronimo

texts.es:
El señor José tiene 39 años de edad, vive en la zona sur de Honduras, junto con el viven sus hijos y su esposa quien le apoyan  en  todas sus actividades.
Don José su negocio es venta de mercadería nueva actividad que realiza desde hace 6 años en su ciudad donde vive, su negocio se encuentra en un punto estratégico  ya que esta en el centro  de su ciudad donde vive y esto hace que sea muy visitado por sus clientes. 
Don José el crédito lo necesita para la compra de camisas, pantalones, sandalias, blusas, jeans, bóxer, bikinis, tenis, zapatos, sandalia de baño etc. Espera que con el crédito sus ventas crezcan ya que comprara más producto y de esta manera satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes los cuales le visitan a diario.  
Don Jose los planes a futuro es seguir creciendo en su actividad comercial y ser uno de los mejores en su región y de esta manera generarse mejores ingresos y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida y la de su familia.



Choluteca, Honduras - Noviembre  del 2012
texts.en:
Mr. José is 39 years old and lives in the southern part of Honduras. He lives together with his children and his wife, who supports him in all of his activities. Don José's business is selling new merchandise, an activity he has been doing for the past 6 years in the city where he lives. His business is located in a strategic point in the city center, which makes it very convenient for his customers. Don José needs this loan to purchase shirts, pants, sandals, blouses, jeans, boxer shorts, bikinis, tennis shoes, shoes, flip-flops, etc. He hopes that this loan will increase his sales, because he will buy more products and be able to better satisfy the demands of his regular customers. Don José's plans for the future include continuing to grow his business and to become one of the best in the region. In this way, he will generate more sales and, in a small way, be able to improve the quality of life for himself and his family.

Choluteca, Honduras - November 2012

loans.use: to purchase shirts, pants, sandals, blouses, jeans, boxer shorts, bikinis, tennis shoes, shoes, flip-flops, etc. for his business.

loans.name: La Gran Alianza Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LA GRAN ALIANZA”; Este banco se ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Modesta  ella es viuda, tiene 40 años y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia lleva años en este negoció el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia cría a estos animalitos para luego venderlos  a sus clientes que las le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de cuyes para su negocio.

Los otros socios  se dedican al negocio de carpinteria, venta de chicha, venta de pasamanería, venta de golosinas, restaurante, imprenta, venta de productos de belleza, tienda de abarrotes, cevicheria.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These members belong to the communal bank "La Gran Alianza" (The Great Alliance). This group is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province and department of Cusco.

One member is Señora Modesta. She is a widow. She is 40 years old and has 5 children. She alternates her daily activities with her business of raising small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She has had this business for years, and it is going well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She raises these little animals to later sell them to her customers, who request them from her. She is a responsible person, since in this way she is raising her family. She is applying for the loan to buy guinea pigs for her business.

The other members work in carpentry, selling chicha (a local beverage), selling trimmings for sewing, selling candy, a restaurant, printing, selling beauty products, grocery store, and a ceviche restaurant.

This bank member [Señora Modesta] is grateful to those who form part of her dream through this means, and she promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs for her business

loans.name: Jesus Redentor Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “JESUS REDENTOR”  iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Jhuly es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de cosméticos, tienda de barrio, productos varios, plantas y masetas, venta de edredones, librería, chicharroneria.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Jhuly es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una asesora de la institución que le fue a visitar a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de ropa y cosméticos; cuenta que este negocio lo aprendió por iniciativa propia, ya que le generaba buena remuneración.
