texts.en: Aydee is still working at one of the most opulent restaurants in the city of Urubamba.  She has been working at the restaurant for four years now and it is going very well for her.  Aydee is still raising small livestock, such as guinea pigs.  Currently, she needs a loan to buy guinea pigs.  Aydee is a member of the Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja Group, which is made up of members who live and work in the town of Rumichaca Baja.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs

loans.name: Reina

texts.es: Reyna de 56 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y un hijo que se dedica a trabajar. Reina posee una venta de frutas y verduras, la cual está ubicada en un  mercado muy grande que cuenta con la visita de muchas personas diariamente,  ella cuenta con poca competencia en el lugar y varios clientes fijos, lo que es una gran ventaja.  Reina solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar frutas y verduras por mayor, de manera que las pueda obtener a precios más bajos, así mismo utilizará este préstamo para construir una habitación extra en su casa de habitación en la que construirá una pila grande para guardar agua ya que en su lugar de habitación el agua escasea mucho. Reina es una mujer responsable y trabajadora quien se dedica de lleno a su trabajo y cuenta con un gran compromiso el cual es brindar los mejores productos.
texts.en: Reyna is 56 years old and lives with her husband and son who works.  She has a fruit and vegetable business located in a large market visited by many people each day.  She has little competition and several steady customers, which is a great advantage for her.  Reina is asking for a loan so that she can buy fruits and vegetables in quantity so that she can get them for lower prices.  She will also use some of the money to build another room onto her house where she will install a large water tank because water gets scarce where she lives.  Reina is a very responsible and hardworking woman who gives her all to her work and has a commitment to provide the best products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and add a water tank.

loans.name: Maria Dolores

texts.es: María de 50 años de edad, vive junto a su hija y una pequeña nieta. Ella se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos como crema, queso y requesón, su venta está ubicada en el mercado municipal del lugar en que reside, en donde posee varios clientes los cuales le compran semanal sus productos. Es por esta razón que ella solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar más productos lácteos como requesón, crema y más tipos de quesos, ya que este es un negocio muy bueno y estable, el cual le brindar muy buenas ganancias, por lo que desea hacerlo crecer más. De esta manera María desea poder superarse como comerciante y así mismo brindarle una vida mejor a su hijo en la cual posee todo lo necesario para tener una vida digna.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old. She lives together with her daughter and a young granddaughter. She earns her living by selling dairy products like cream, cheese, and "requesón" [a creamier Latin American version of ricotta]. Her stall is located in the municipal market in her town, and she has several weekly buyers of her products. 

María is requesting a loan with which she will be able to buy more dairy products like requesón, cream, and more types of cheese, since her business is very good and stable. This will provide her with very good earnings, which is why she wants to grow her business more. 

María wishes to improve herself as a businesswoman and thereby provide her daughter with a better life in which she has everything she needs to have a respectable life.

loans.use: to purchase dairy products to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients to make pupusas for sale.

loans.name: Magda Estela

texts.es: Magda de 44 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo en casa de su padre, ella posee un negocio propio en cual fue heredado por su padre y que es de mucha ayuda para su economía.  Ella tiene una tienda de productos de primera necesidad como comestibles y productos de uso diario en el hogar, muchos productos poseen una gran demanda por parte de las personas, las cuales Magda desea mucho poder aumentar, ya que le permitirán tener mayores ganancias lo cual es muy importante para ella, ya que es gracias a la tienda que tanto ella como se esposo poseen una vida estable. Magda solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la tienda comprando productos como leche en polvo, pan, golosinas y sodas, entre otro número de productos más. Magda posee una gran ilusión de poder ver su negocio en mejores condiciones y brindándoles el dinero necesario para salir adelante.
texts.en: Magda is 44 years old and lives with her husband in her father’s home.  She has a business that she inherited from her father and it has been great financial help.  She has a store where she sells consumables and daily use products for the home.  Many of the products are in high demand and Magda wants to increase her inventory because they provide good profits which is important to her and helps her and her husband have a stable life.  Magda is asking for this loan in order to buy products such as powdered milk, bread, snacks, and sodas among other things.  Magda has a great hope to be able to see her business in a better state and have the money she needs to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy products.

loans.name: Jose Ovidio

texts.es: José de 38 años de edad, es una persona responsable y previsora quien le gusta trabajar para contar con todo lo necesario. Él es una persona muy humilde que vive junto a sus padres, José se dedica a la carpintería, poseyendo un negocio en el que se dedica a la elaboración de muebles, roperos, estantes, sillas, y todo lo que sus clientes le pidan y se pueda realizar con madera. José tiene mucha experiencia ya que cuenta con 13 años de trabajar de esta manera, siendo muy conocido por muchas personas y también es muy recomendado ya que realiza trabajos muy finos. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, por medio del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de madera, para que no le haga falta y de este modo aceptar los trabajos que le pidan, con lo que pueda mejorar en gran manera sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Jose is 38 years old and is a responsible visionary person who likes to work to have what he needs.  He is a humble person who lives with his parents and works as a carpenter, having a business where he makes furniture, clothing cabinets, shelves, chairs, and whatever his customers request that can be made of wood.

Jose has 12 years’ experience and is well known by many people.  He also comes highly recommended because he does fine work.  Jose is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so that he can buy quantities of lumber so that he will not be short and can accept more jobs.  This will help him increase his income.

loans.use: to buy lumber.

loans.name: Blanca Marvin

texts.es: Blanca de 35 años de edad, es una madre de familia muy responsable quien se dedica de lleno a su trabajo para brindarle la ayuda necesaria a su esposo con los gastos familiares.  Blanca se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas, las cuales comercializa de lunes a domingo tanto al mediodía como por las tardes,  ella debe trabajar muy duro  ya que ella cuenta con varios clientes, los cuales se saturan, sobre todo en las horas pico. Este ha sido un negocio de mucha ayuda tanto para Blanca como para toda su familia, por lo que solicita un préstamo a través del cual pueda comprar mayor cantidad de maíz, leña, cal y una refrigeradora lo cual será de mucha ayuda para ella. La elaboración de tortillas es un trabajo muy duro pero Blanca lo realiza con actitud positiva ya que sabe que de esta manera les dará todo lo necesario a sus tres hijos.
texts.en: Blanca is 35 years old and a very responsible mother who gives her all to her work so that she can help her husband with the family expenses.  Blanca makes and sells tortillas in the afternoons and evenings,   seven days a week.  She must work hard because she has some steady customers who saturate her, especially at peak times.  This business has been a great help to Blanca and the rest of the family.  She is asking for this loan so that she can buy corn in quantity, firewood, salt, and a refrigerator which will be a great help to her.  Making tortillas is hard work, but Blanca does it with a positive attitude and knows that this way she will be able to provide her children with all they need.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Jose Angel

texts.es: José es un comerciante muy entrepido y trabajador quien se dedica a la venta de productos como controles remotos para televisores, café molido, accesorios para relojes, entre otros más, el los comercializa de forma ambulante por colonias y pueblos, dando a conocer sus productos de casa en casa. José vive junto a su esposa y cuatro hijos menores de edad, quienes se dedican a estudiar, principal razón por la que se esfuerza mucho más y no permitir que le haga falta nada a sus hijos. José solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda surtir su negocio comprando más controles remotos de diferentes marcas, también para comprar más accesorios de relojes, con lo que él espera mejorar significativamente sus ventas.
texts.en: Jose is a very intrepid and hardworking merchant who sells things like TV remotes, ground coffee, watch accessories, and other things.  He sells on foot within neighborhoods and towns, showing his products from door to door.  Jose lives with his wife and four children, who attend school.  They are the main reason he works so hard so that they are not in need of anything.  Jose is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL so that he can stock his business with more remote controls of different brands, and also watch accessories.  He expects to improve his sales significantly.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Veronica Lisseth

texts.es: Verónica de 26 años de edad, es una joven madre de dos pequeños de 3 años y otro de seis meses de vida, ella es madre soltera y se esfuerza mucho para poder vivir establemente. Verónica trabaja como costurera, ella se encarga de confeccionar ropa formal, uniformes y ropa casual, ella es alguien muy detallista quien desarrolla un trabajo muy bueno, lo que le permite contar con la fidelidad de muchos clientes amigos y vecinos. Verónica elabora trabajos por encargo y así mismo elabora prendas de vestir para vender en su casa de habitación, donde también se dedica a elaborar su trabajo con lo que puede obtener ganancias extras. Verónica  solicita un préstamo con el fin de poder comprar telas en diferentes colores y estampados, así mismo comprar hilo, agujas y todo lo necesario para elaborar la ropa con lo que pueda realizar más trabajos.
texts.en: Twenty-six-year-old Verónica is a young mother of two little ones, a three-year-old and a six-month-old.  She is a single mother and she works very hard to have stability in her life.  Verónica works as a seamstress; she makes formal clothing, uniforms, and casual clothing.  She is a very detail-oriented person who does very good work, which has allowed her to count on the loyalty of many customers, friends, and neighbors.  Verónica does work to order and she also makes garments on her own to sell in her home.  Her home is also where she does her work, which allows her to earn extra.  Verónica is asking for a loan to buy fabrics in different colors and patterns, as well as to buy thread, needles, and all the things she needs to make clothing so she can do more work.

loans.use: to buy fabrics to make clothing

loans.name: Teresa De Jesus

texts.es: Teresa de 65 años de edad, es una mujer muy trabajadora y dedicada al bien de su familia ella vive junto a dos hijos y su esposo. Teresa trabaja elaborando minutas las cuales son hechas de hielo granizado y bañado con jarabes de diferentes sabores, estos postres tienen mucha demanda debido a clima cálido este país y así mismo al buen sabor y bajo costo. Ella comercializa las minutas de forma ambulante, por distintos parques y lugares de turismo como playas, iglesias y mercados. Teresa solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder comprar un carretón nuevo donde coloca el hielo, así mismo para comprar frutas, miel, jarabes de sabores, vasos y cucharas para colocar las minutas. Lo que Teresa más desea es poder aumentar sus ventas significativamente y de esta forma poder tener una vida más estable junto a su familia.
texts.en: Teresa is 65 years old and is a hardworking woman dedicated to her family’s wellbeing. She lives with her two children and her husband.  She makes snow cones from shaved ice covered with syrup of different flavors.  These desserts are in great demand because of the hot weather in this country and they taste good and are low cost.  She sells the snow cones on foot in different parks and tourist areas like beaches, churches, and markets.  Teresa is asking for this loan from INTEGRAL to a new cart, and also fruits, syrup, flavored syrups, cups, spoons.  Teresa really wants to be able to increase her sales significantly to be able to give her family a more stable life.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.en: Lucia is a hard working mother who buys and sells vegetables in the local community. She is 44 years old, married and has two school-age children. Due to the hardships of living, Lucia aims to improve her business and generate sufficient income to finance the education of her children and satisfy their daily needs. To improve the business, she wants to buy more vegetables to sell but since she has inadequate capital, she is asking for 10,000 PHP to buy additional stock of tomatoes, carrots, cabbages, onions, eggplants and beans. Through this loan, she believes that she will improve the business and improve their status of living as she continues to work hard and strive for it.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of tomatoes, carrots, cabbages, onions, eggplants and beans to sell

loans.name: Apolo

texts.en:
Apolo is 32 years old, married and blessed with one child.  His wife is an overseas Filipino worker at Brunei, while he is busy running his two hectares of rice field.

It's been seven years since he start cultivating his farm land.  According to him, gained profits from his rice field was used to cover up all their daily household expenses and to buy his hand tractor machinery. 

Apolo's main goal is to improve his rice crop production so he can improve his family's standard of living and to educate his child.  for his family.  To make all this things possible, Apolo is seeking a loan of PHP35,000.  He will use this amount to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, insecticides and to hire laborers to transplant his farm land. 

He hopes that his requested loan amount will be granted.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs such as fertilizer, insecticides and to hire laborers to transplant his farm land.

loans.name: Aurelio

texts.en:
Aurelio is living with his wife and one child at the village of San Jose.  He has owned and operated a one and a half hectare rice field for the past five years.  

He is really glad that he is able to make his rice field productive.  Now, he would like to maintain continuous growth so he can earn better yields and profits, which will be used to cover all of his family's household expenses.

Aurelio is asking for additional capital of PHP30,000 to buy necessary farm inputs such as fertilizer and insecticides.  This will help him gain better yields, every harvest season and enables him to earn greater profits.

loans.use: to buy necessary farm inputs such as fertilizer and insecticides.

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 43 years old, married, and has three children. One of her children is attending college. With her spouse, they manage a farming business, planting and harvesting rice to sell. Evelyn usually gains about PHP 15,000 to buy pesticides and insecticides used in farming. 

Evelyn would like to increase crop production for her family's sustenance, especially for education. That is why she is now asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy pesticides and insecticides for use in farming. This will help ensure a healthy growth of crops and an abundant crop harvest.

Evelyn hopes to maintain productive yields every harvest season and to become a successful farmer someday, for the overall welfare of her family.

loans.use: to buy pesticides and insecticides used in farming.

loans.name: Efren

texts.en:
Efren is a farmer living at Solana with his wife and children.  He plants and harvests rice to sell to traders and has been in business for over 10 years.  

He usually earns about P20,000 twice a year, during harvest season.  He used the money to pay school expenses and to meet his family's daily needs. Efren also saves some income to plant his next crop.  Efren really works hard on his farmland and this ensures a healthy harvest in order to gain more profits. 

Efren wanted to keep increasing his yield and that is why he is seeking to borrow additional capital in the amount of P40,000.  He will buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides.  It will help nourish his crops. 

With a good harvest, Efren will attain income stability and achieve business progression in the future.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, insecticides and pesticides.

loans.name: Robin

texts.en:
Robin is a farmer living with his children and spouse at Solana.  He plant and harvest rice to sell to traders at their village.  He's been in business for over 10 years.  

He used his profits to pay for meals and education expenses.  He usually earns about P20,000 each harvest season (twice a year).  Robin aims to increase his income and that is why he is asking for a loan of P45,000 to buy rice seeds to grow, fertilizers and insecticides.  This will help ensure healthy growth and nutrition of his crops. 

Robin would like to keep producing abundant harvests that will lead to the improvement of his family's living conditions.  He wants to become a successful entrepreneur someday.

loans.use: to buy rice seeds to grow, fertilizers and insecticides.

loans.name: Maria Edith

texts.es: María Edith de cincuenta y ocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de verduras, carnes, pollo entre otros, toda su mercadería es de primera calidad y la vende a precios accesibles, es muy conocida en la zona donde reside, tiene mucha experiencia en las ventas y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que le permite estar adelante de la competencia, además de su excelente servicio; María es una mujer que ama su labor, trabaja desde muy temprano para al final del día poder compartir con lo mas importante para ella su familia, es emprendedora, enérgica y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, quiere alcanzar el éxito y no descansara hasta lograrlo, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda de su producto y necesita aumentar la inversión por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar verduras, pollo, carne etc. María Edith tiene buenas referencias de pago por parte de sus conocidos, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda en el periodo establecido y al mismo tiempo tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
María Edith is 58 years old, and lives with her life companion and her two children in their own house.

She sells vegetables, meat, chicken and other items. All of her merchandise is top quality, and she sells it at affordable prices. She is very well known in the area where she lives, has a great deal of experience selling, and has acquired a large clientele. This, in addition to her excellent service, allows her to stay ahead of the competition.

María is a woman who loves what she does, and works from an early hour until the end of the day, to be able to share her earnings with her family; as for her they are the most important thing. She is an enterprising, energetic woman, and has a great desire to succeed. She wants to achieve success and will not rest until she does. In recent weeks, demand for products has increased and she needs to increase her investment. 

That is why she's applying to Integral for a loan that will allow her to buy vegetables, chicken, meat, etc. María Edith has good payment references from people who know her. She says she will be able to pay off the debt within the timeframe established, and at the same time has faith that she will be able to bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, chicken and meat.

loans.name: Majidan

texts.en: Ms. Majidan is a 29-year-old widow. She is the mother of two children. Her husband died three years ago, and she was in miserable condition just after his death. She is trying hard to fulfill the needs of her children. In order to support her family members, she is running a business manufacturing carpets. She offers various handmade carpets in different colors. She has become famous for providing good quality carpets in her community. She is contentedly doing it for the sake of her family. She is also sewing as a part-time job. In this way, she is able to handle her family's needs and requirements effectively. She has applied for a loan of PKR 20,000 from the Kashf Foundation to buy good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibres to increase her sales. She wishes to spend part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy good quality wool, nylon, polyester, and polypropylene fibres to increase her sales.

loans.name: Gamman

texts.en: Ms. Gamman 47 years old and the mother of three children. For 25 years, Gamman has been running a business selling milk. She initiated her own business by buying a buffalo to support her family when her husband was the only bread-earner. With time, her sales increased and so did her income. Now she has two buffaloes and two cows. This has all happened due to her courage and determination. Because of her work, she is respected in her home. While talking to the Kashf officer, she shared the feeling of achievement she got from sending her two sons to school for education. She has some savings and has applied for a loan of PKR 30,000 to buy another buffalo. She is in her second loan cycle with the Kashf Foundation. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to buy another buffalo.

loans.name: Shahzadi

texts.en:
Ms. Shahzadi is a 23-year-old woman who has been running a business of hand embroidery for many years. She has become famous in her town for providing exclusive designs for weddings and parties. She initiated her own business to support her family when her father was the only bread-earner. She makes enough to contribute in the family income. Because of her work, she is respected in her home.

In order to complete orders on time, she needs to buy raw materials, so she contacted the Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 20,000. She will use this loan to buy spools of threads and packs of sequins, pearls, and glitter for embellishment. This will help her complete more orders on time, which ultimately helps in bring in more cash. She is very thankful to Kashf for its support.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread and packs of sequins, pearls, and glitter for embellishment.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es: Natividad de sesenta y siete años de edad vive junto a su compañera de vida y sus hijos y nietos en casa propia, el posee una venta de productos de aluminio y plástico como ollas, guacales, comales entre otros , tiene varios años con el negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia valiosa en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el negocio esta ubicado en un lugar estratégico que califico como muy bueno para sus actividades comerciales,  es muy conocido, tiene mucha clientela pues las personas lo prefieren porque todo lo que vende es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además  del servicio inigualable siempre a la orden de los clientes; Natividad es un hombre enérgico, trabajador, y con muchas metas por delante, esta dispuesto a esforzarse al máximo pues sabe que solo así podrá cumplir sus sueños y llegar al éxito, como todo buen comerciante quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar nuevas inversiones pero no posee de suficiente capital por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar producto plástico y de aluminio etc. Natividad tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Natividad is 67 years old and lives with his life partner, his children, and grandchildren in his own home.  He sells aluminum and plastic products such as pots, bowls, and griddles, among other things.  He has been doing this for several years and has gained lots of sales experience which allows him to earn a good income.  His business in located in a strategic location, known to be very good for business.  He is very well known and has many customers who prefer to buy from him because he sells quality products at good prices, and provides excellent service, always meeting his customers’ needs.

Natividad is an energetic, hardworking man with many goals ahead.  He is prepared to work hard and to the maximum extent because he knows that this is the only way to achieve his dream and succeed.  Like a good merchant he wants to grow his business and make some new investments, but he doesn’t have enough capital, so he is asking for a loan through INTEGRAL.  This will allow him to buy plastic and aluminum items, etc.  Natividad comes with good payment references and is certain that he will be able to get out of debt while providing some financial security to his household.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Rubina

texts.en:
Ms. Rubina is a 46-year-old married woman. She initiated her own business of hand-embroidery with the help of the Kashf Foundation. She wants to contribute to the family income to support the needs of her family members. She is a hard-working woman with extraordinary skills and wishes to fulfill the needs of her four children. 

She has requested a loan of PKR 20,000 from the Kashf Foundation to buy a wooden frame and spools of threads, pearls, and sequins in various colours. She said that microfinance services allowed her to improve the standard of living of her family and send her kids to school. Now she has better access to the basic necessities of life and living a happy life with her family.

loans.use: to buy a wooden frame and spools of thread, pearls, and sequins in various colours.

loans.name: Maria Milagro

texts.es: María Milagro de cincuenta años de edad vive junto a sus nietos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas en variedad, revueltas, de queso, frijol con queso entre otras  tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite elaborar las mejores pupusas y asi obtener as mejores ganancias, comercia desde su residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que se prepara es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además con el mejor servicio; María es una mujer activa entregada a su labor, lo que más desea en su vida es cumplir sus sueños, por eso trabaja con mucho esfuerzo sabe que así alcanzara el éxito; desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda y  no quiere decepcionar a sus clientes, es así como decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que le permita invertir en insumos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz,  quesillo, chicharrón, frijoles verduras, etc. María Milagro tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, agrádese la colaboración y asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Milagro is 50 years old and lives with her grandchildren in her own home.  She sells different types of pupsas (cheese, beans) and has been doing this for several years.  This has brought her lots of valuable experience and is has allowed her to make the best pupusas so she can have greater earnings.  She sells from her home and has many customers who know that she prepares quality food, at good prices and gives the best service.

Maria is very dedicated to her work and what she most wants is to achieve her dreams, so she works with great effort and knows she will succeed.  Demand increased some time ago and she doesn’t want to disappoint her customers, so she decided to increase production.  She doesn’t have enough capital to buy supplies, so she has requested a loan through INTEGRAL so she can buy dried corn, cheese, pork rinds, beans, vegetables, etc.  Maria Milagro comes with good payment references and is certain that she will be able to get out of debt while providing a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Virgilio

texts.en:
Virgilio is a resourceful and responsible man. He is 57 years of age, married with five children. Two of his children are married, two go to school and the other child helps in his rice field. Virgilio's priority in life is to increase his profit so he can let his two children finish their studies and give them a better way of life and sustain all their basic necessities in life.

Virgilio would like to borrow additional capital of PHP 25,000 from lenders. He will use this loan amount to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, insecticides and pay for the labor cost of transplanting his rice crop to his farm land. Virgilio believes that his success will rely on him operating his farming business well. In addition, he could attain his goal in life through continuous access of financial assistance of lenders to his business.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer, insecticides and pay for the labor cost of transplanting his rice crops

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Federico

texts.en:
Federico is a hardworking and responsible spouse and father to his four children. Two of his children are still studying; his eldest is working and the other one is his companion in cultivating their two hectares of rice field. 

Federico’s aim is to have a better way of living, let his two children finish their studies and be able to have continuous growth of his farming business. Aside from growing of rice crops, he has also engaged himself in raising hogs. Federico would like to improve his farming business but due to shortage of capital, he is seeking for a loan of PHP 25,000 allowing him to buy fertilizer, insecticides and herbicides. He is hoping for approval of his requested loan amount so he can attain his goal in life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides and herbicides to ensure proper growth of his rice crop

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Al-Mlka Group

texts.en: This group is Al-mlka which consists of 4 ladies who live in Sana`a, Yemen. They applied for a loan of 200,000 YER. Malka is the leader of this group and is 53 years old. She applied for a loan of 50000 YER from AMB to buy furniture for her house.

loans.use: to buy furniture for her house.

loans.name: Al-Boary Group

texts.en:
This group is called Al-Boary. It consists of three ladies and a man who live in Aden, Yemen.
Samira is 45 years old and married. She has five children. She has worked very hard for many years to get her family ahead and give them everything they deserve. She has been selling cosmetic products, which is her main source of income. 
Samira's dream is to see her business flourish. Due to the current bad situation in Yemen, her enterprise has earned less profit. She took out a loan of 50,000 YER from AMB to stock her business with more cosmetic products and perfumes so that her customers can always find what they need.

loans.use: to stock her business with more cosmetic products and perfumes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more liquid soap, detergents and cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Mumtaz

texts.en: Mumtaz is a 41-year-old married woman and mother of three children, two attending school. Three years ago, she started her own business of clothing sales when her husband got severely ill. She didn’t lose hope and contacted Kashf Foundation upon the advice of her neighbor to initiate her own business. She buys clothes of different designs from the market in bulk at lower rates and sells them in her community. She counts a good client list and most of her clients are her neighbors. She has gradually improved her business and is now requesting a loan of 30,000 PKR, her third from Kashf Foundation. She is going to use this loan to buy an ample variety of cloth in a larger quantity to add to her current stock. She intends to use the earned profits for her children’s education.

loans.use: to buy a variety of cloth in a larger quantity to add to her current stock.

loans.name: Najma

texts.en: Najma is 27 years old and married. Eight years ago, she started her own business running a beauty parlor in her own house after separating from her husband. She was worried but she didn’t lose hope and contacted Kashf Foundation upon the advice of her neighbor to establish her business.  She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. She purchased better quality materials and some furniture for the parlor. She counts a good client list, and most of her clients are her neighbors. To meet the requirements of her parlor, she has requested a loan of 30000 PKR. She is going to use this loan to buy good quality kits for bridal makeup and packs of beauty and skin care products. She wishes to spend part of her profit on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to buy good quality kits for bridal makeup and packs of beauty and skin care products.

loans.name: Joel

texts.en:
Joel is a hog raiser and farmer. According to him, his main source of income comes from planting of corn crops. Since his farming is improving, he decided to raise hogs as his additional source of income. He is currently raising two sows and two fattening hogs.

Joel would like to have continuous growth of his business, but he struggles with shortage of capital. With regards to this matter, he is asking for a loan of PHP 13,000 to allow him to buy hog feed and vitamins. Also, some of the amount will be used for maintenance of his corn-farming business.

Joel hopes that he can obtain his requested loan amount so he can provide all his family’s needs, educate all his children and improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and vitamins for his hogs and to maintain his corn-farming business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Rocky

texts.en:
Rocky has been engaged in the hog-raising business for one year. Aside from raising hogs, he also has one hectare of corn farmland, which was his main source of income before. Rocky is a young livelihood businessman. He is happily married and blessed with only one child.

Rocky's wife owns a retail store, while he is in charge in taking care of his farm and livestock business. Gained profits from his farm and livestock go to their daily household expenditures, and additional capital goes to his wife’s retail store. 

With his determination to have a comfortable lifestyle and give his only child a quality education, Rocky is seeking financial support from lenders. He is asking for a loan of PHP 13,000, which will be used to buy hog feed. Also, some of it will be used to finance his corn farming business.

Rocky knows that this amount will have a great impact in making his livestock more profitable and obtaining success in life, and so with his businesses.

loans.use: to buy hog feed and also to maintain his corn-farming business.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Lela

texts.en:
Lela is 42 years old. She lives with her husband and two sons in the small village of Zestaponi district. Her husband works locally as an artisan and gets monthly income. 

The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a milk cow and two calves. Besides, they have 0.7 hectares of agricultural land where 50 nut trees are grown. They also have a vineyard, where 1000 samples of vine are grown. They sell the harvested products locally in an open market at a good price. Lela is a very hard-working woman and does her best to ensure in a good harvest. 

Lela requested a loan for renovating the house. Their house is too old and is in bad condition; it needs renovation. After renovation, their living conditions will be improved. Lela awaits your support.

loans.use: to renovate her house.

loans.name: Parveen

texts.en:
Ms. Parveen is a 39-year-old married woman. She had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work to support her family for their better future. 

Ten years ago, Parveen began sewing work in her house. She sews for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. She provides for eight children. Now her husband and a son are also working. However, due to lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers.  

Parveen is currently in her first loan cycle and has borrowed Rs. 15,000 from Kashf. She intends to use this loan amount to buy raw material, including cloth, thread of different colors, laces, zippers, etc., to create a means of increasing revenues so she may be able to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to buy raw material, including cloth, thread of different colors, laces, zippers, etc.

loans.name: Raheeela

texts.en:
Raheeela is a 23-year-old woman. She has been doing a business of stitching for the past two years. She initiated her business to contribute to the family's income. She very well knows the techniques of stitching and has a good client list. Her husband is working in a factory. 

However, due to lack of availability of funds, Raheeela is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. She is currently in her second loan cycle and has borrowed PKR 25,000 from Kashf Foundation. 

She intends to use this loan to buy raw materials, including cloth and spools of thread in different colors. In this way, she would be able to increase her sales which would ultimately help in generating more income.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, including cloth and spools of thread in different colors.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine has operated her sewing business for 14 years. She is 54 years old, married and has three children.Two of her children are married while her youngest child is still searching for a job.

Josephine sews different kinds of dresses and make some pillow cases within her local community. She knows that this kind of business has a great opportunity for her to earn good profits and achieve her goals in life. Aside from sewing, Josephine also owns one hectare of a rice field and has a motorcycle transportation business.

Josephine would like to borrow PHP 12,000 to buy garments, assorted threads and zippers. She knows that through her requested loan amount, she could satisfy her costumer demand and become a popular seamstress because of the quality of the dresses she sews. For this reason, she hopes for continuous access to financial services from lenders so she could have a comfortable living condition and save some for emergency purposes.

loans.use: to buy garments, assorted threads and zippers for her sewing business.

loans.name: Manzooran

texts.en: Mrs. Manzooran is a 44-year-old married, active woman. She is a mother of four children. She is trying hard to fulfill their demands including food, health, clothing, and education. She started her business because her husband’s income was not sufficient to meet the daily demands of the family members. She has been manufacturing carpet for many years. Her carpet is used in mosques for the purpose of prayer. She makes them from a special kind of wood, which is bought during the winter season. She offers various handmade carpets in different cities, and she has become famous for providing good quality carpets in her community. She is happily doing it for the sake of her family. She also sews as her part-time job. In this way, she is able to handle her family's needs and requirements effectively. This is her second year with the Kashf Foundation. She is satisfied with the support of the Kashf Foundation. She has applied for a loan of Rs 30,000 to buy good quality wood and some tools to build her sales. She wishes to spend a part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: To buy good quality wood and some tools to build her sales

loans.name: Apple Group

texts.en:
Devota, who is in her early 40s, is married with two children who go to school. She has been a food vendor for five years. She works from 8.00 am to 11.00 pm daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Devota's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania Ltd. She used the previous loan to increase the grocery inventory and cover household expenses and school fees. She successfully paid back her loan. Now, she hopes for a loan to restock the grocery items. Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

Devota will share this loan with her ten-member loan group, Apple Group. The group will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to restock grocery items.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Robina

texts.en:
Robina is a 32-year-old, married woman. She had faced a difficult time after her husband's business failure. 

Four years ago, she began stitching work in her house, with her husband. She stitches for the people living around her house and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to the lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. 

Robina provides for five children. Among them, three are going to school. Robina has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. She is currently in her second loan cycle and is now borrowing PKR 25,000 with Kashf Foundation. This will help her to purchase more spools of thread, packs of buttons, laces, zippers, etc. In this way, Robina would be able to deal on time with the orders of her customers.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of thread, packs of buttons, laces, zippers, etc. for her sewing business.

loans.name: Vasil

texts.en: Vasil is 46 years old. He lives in a small village of the Zestaponi district with his wife and 20-year-old daughter. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a pig, two milk cows, and a calf. In addition to this, they have 0.7 hectare of agricultural land, where 70 nut trees and 1,000 samples of vine are grown. They sell the harvested products locally in an open market and at a good price. Vasil is a very hard-working man and does his best to ensure a good harvest. He requested a loan for renovating his house, since their house is too old and is in a bad condition. After the renovations, their living conditions will improve. He awaits your support.

loans.use: To renovate his house

loans.name: Mahduma

texts.en:
Mahduma is a 26-year-old woman and a mother of three. Her husband is a salaried person, employed in a factory, but his earnings are not enough for his family. 

Therefore, three years ago, Mahduma started the business of milk sales with the help of her husband. She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation and she has had a strong association with Kashf for four years. 

Currently, in order to purchase another cow, Mahduma requested a loan of PKR 40000. This would enable her to cater to more customers in her community, which would increase her earnings.

loans.use: to purchase another cow and increase her milk sales.

loans.name: Asifa

texts.en:
Ms. Asifa is a 23-year-old married woman. She got married at an early age and faced many problems in running her house. Her husband is employed in a furniture manufacturing shop and earns not enough income to provide his family with bread and butter. Eight years ago, Asifa initiated a business of tandoor (clay oven used for cooking in North India and Pakistan) to support her family.

Asifa has three children. She is motivated to provide them with a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing. She has improved her business to meet the day-to-day expenses of life. 

It is Asifa’s third year with Kashf Foundation, and she is happily running her business with the support of it. Now she requested a loan of Rs. 30,000 to purchase sacks of flour with the packs of salt and oil. 

She hopes to have an increase in the number of customers and desires to use the earned profits on her children’s education.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of flour with the packs of salt and oil.

loans.name: Edmundo

texts.en:
Edmundo is engaged in a direct selling business, particularly selling herbal products. He is a single, yet business-oriented person. He has been selling these herbal products since 1999. According to him, he acquired his products at Makati Manila. 

Edmundo doesn't stop believing that he could be a better entreprenuer someday. He is really a man full of hopes. Edmundo got interested in therapy, so he enrolled himself at TESDA (Technical Education and Skills Development Authority). After his massage therapy vocational course, he now exercises his skills with his customers of herbal products and in nearby villages and municipalities.

Edmundo would like to take out a loan of PHP 10,000. This will allow him to buy stocks of herbal products, due to many orders of his customers. He hopes for approval of his requested loan amount so he could supply all his customers.

In this way, he could gain better profits and, at the same time, he could motivate all his customers to become conscious of their health always.

loans.use: to buy stocks of herbal medicines for his direct selling business.

loans.name: Martine

texts.en:
Martine is in her sixties and married. She is applying for a loan to help her husband, Mehill, who has been offering transportation and electrical services to their community for the past 20 years. 

Through this activity, they have been able to build a better life. “It’s not only about money, but about the satisfaction I get from serving people,” Mehill said. “Every day, I follow the same routine, yet I never get bored of it,” he continued saying.

The loan Martine requests is for ALL 100,000 (Albanian Lek). This would be her second loan, the previous one being paid off on-time. This loan will be used to make repairs to the taxi and to purchase electrical parts. Both Martine and Mehill have been photographed here.

loans.use: to make repairs to the taxi and to purchase electrical parts for her husband's business.

loans.name: Usman

texts.en:
Usman is 56 years old and a married woman. She had a difficult time after her husband's business failure. She decided to work with her husband and to support her family for a better future. Six years ago she began a general store in her house to support her entire family. However, due to lack of availability of funds she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. 

In order to purchase more stocks of rice, flour and grains she applied for a loan of PKR 45000. She is currently in her 5th loan cycle and has shown a good repayment history. She wishes to spend part of revenue on the expansion of her business.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of rice, flour and grains.

loans.name: George

texts.en:
George is 62 years old. He lives in the small village of Zestaponi district with his wife and three children. His son works locally as an artisan and gets a monthly income. The family runs an agricultural business. In particular, they have a plot of land where haricot (beans) is grown. They sell the harvested product locally, in an open market, at a good price. 

George is a very hard-working man and does his best to ensure a good harvest. He has requested a loan for renovating his house. Their house is too old and is in bad condition; it needs renovation. After renovation, the family's living conditions will be improved. George awaits your support.

loans.use: to renovate his house.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is 33 years old and a married woman. She has been doing the work of hand embroidery for the past two years after her husband’s business failure.  She's become famous in her community and makes enough to contribute to the family income. 

However, due to the lack of availe funds, she is unable to meet the daily demands of her customers. For this reason she contacted Kashf Foundation for the first time and applied a loan of PKR 20000. In this way she will be able to purchase packs of sequins, pearls, glittering material for embellishment, along with the spools of threads in various colors. She is hopeful to increase her earnings and is thankful to Kashf for its tremendous support.

loans.use: to purchase packs of sequins, pearls, glittering material for embellishment, and spools of threads in various colors.

loans.name: Bogorikivi Group

texts.fr:
Evelyne fait partie du groupe Bogorikivi et   habite à Gitega. Elle a   29 ans et est mariée à Ernest, un cultivateur. Ensemble ils ont  4 enfants, dont 2 étudient.

Elle fait le commerce de  bière locale depuis 11 ans. 

Elle est à son  deuxième  crédit à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’elle obtient, elle va  augmenter son capital et acheter une grande quantité de bière locale à revendre, pour gagner plus. 

Dans les prochaines  années, elle voudrait acheter une parcelle.
texts.en:
Emelyne belongs to the Bogorikivi group and lives in Gitega.  She is 29 years old and married to Ernest, a farmer.  The couple have four children, two of whom attend school.

Emelyne has been selling local beer for 11 years.

This is Emelyne's second loan from Turame.  With this Kiva loan, she will increase her capital and buy a large quantity of local beer to re-sell so that she can earn more money.

In the not-so-distant future, she would like to buy a plot of land.

loans.use: to increase her capital and buy a large quantity of local beer to re-sell

loans.name: Vasil

texts.en:
Vasil is from the Zestaponi district, West Georgia. He is 34 years old and lives with his brother and father who is provided with a retirement pension. Vasil works at the public registry and his brother works for an auditing service. Both of them get monthly salaries. The family is involved in the agricultural business. In particular, they have a vineyard and pick grapes in the late summer. The harvested grapes are used for producing wine and vodka, which are sold at the local open market.

With the received credit, Vasil will purchase pigs. He will place the pigs in a shed located in their yard, raise them and after several months the family will be able to have piglets. This will increase the family's animal husbandry business and their income as well. With the increased income, Vasil will improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Judith; la socia continua con su negocio de venta de jugos,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad de Cusco,la socia trabaja desde las 07:00am hasta las 09:00pm ,a la vez la socia continua alquilando su carro para brindar el servicio de taxi siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro y para comprar frutas para su negocio.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank Santo Domingo, located in the district of Cusco, in the province of Cusco, in the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Judith. She is continuing with her business selling juices. She has been working in this business for years and it has gone very well for her, thanks to the hard work she puts into it each day. Judith also sells juices in one of the markets in Cusco. She works there from 7 a.m. to 9 p.m. At the same time, she also rents out her car to a taxi service so that she can help her family get ahead.

Judith is requesting this loan in order to pay for some maintenance work on her car, and to buy fruit for her business. She is very happy to have this loan and pledges to keep up with the repayments.

loans.use: to do some maintenance work on her car, as well as to buy fruit for her business.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
La socia Gloria pertenece al banco comunal "Santo Domingo" ,la socia continua con su negocio de restaurante ,la socia trabaja desde las 08:00am hasta las 09:00pm , la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia a la vez continua vendiendo comida los fines de semana en una feria gastronomica en la ciudad de Cusco,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia. 


La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para su negocio como arroz,aceite,menestras entre otros. 
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Gloria belongs to the "Santo Domingo" communal bank. She continues to work at her restaurant business. She works from 8:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. She has had this business for years and it is going well for her thanks to the hard work she puts into her business every day. She also continues to sell food weekends at a gastronomy fair in the city of Cuzco. This is how she gets her family ahead.  

She is asking for the loan to buy materials for her business such as rice, cooking oil and vegetable stews, among others. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy materials for her business such as rice, cooking oil, and vegetable stews, among others.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.es: Leonor continúa con la venta de chicha, con la crianza de animales menores y con la venta de jora. Ya son varios años que se dedica a estos negocios y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad Leonor requiere el préstamo para comprar más chanchos y pollos. Leonor es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Leonor continues in her business selling 'chicha' (a corn-based drink), raising small animals, and selling dried corn.  She has been involved in these businesses for some years and everything is going well.

In this opportunity, Leonor requests a loan to buy more pigs and chickens.  She is a member of the group "Las Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja", which is formed of members who live in the village of Rumichaca Baja and carry out their economic activities there.

loans.use: to buy more pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
La socia Marlene pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo”,la socia continua ejerciendo su carrera de contadora ,la socia lleva buen tiempo ejerciendo su carrera el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su trabajo ,la socia cuenta con un estudio contable donde brinda asesoramiento a sus clientes que le solicitan,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para implementar su estudio como en la compra de algunos muebles.
La socia Marlene se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marlene belongs to the communal bank "Santo Domingo".  She continues carrying out her accounting career.  She has been in this profession for some time and everything is going well thanks to the determination she brings to her work every day.  She has an accounting firm where she offers consulting services to her clients that request it; she feels that in this way, she can continue moving forward with her family.

She is asking for a loan in order to supply her accounting firm with some furniture.  Marlene is thankful for the loan and promises to comply with the loan repayment quotas.

loans.use: to supply her accounting firm with some furniture.

loans.name: Tomasa

texts.es: Tomasa continua trabajando en un hotel donde realiza labores de limpieza, ordenar, lavandería, ella trabaja en tiempo completo ósea desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 5 de la tarde de lunes a domingos. Ya son varios años que trabaja y le va muy bien. Tomasa continúa con la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo gallinas y cuyes. Tomasa en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar más animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes y gallinas.Tomasa es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Tomasa continues to work at a hotel where she does cleaning, sorting, and laundry.  She works full time from 8:00am until 5:00pm from Monday to Sunday.  She has been doing that work for many years and it is going very well.  Tomasa also continues to raise small animals such as chickens and guinea pigs.  

Tomasa is requesting a loan to purchase more small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.  She is a member of the "Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja" group which is made up of members who live and work in the town of Rumichaca Baja.

loans.use: to buy animals such as guinea pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.es: Sofía continúa trabajando como administradora de un condominio y en uno de los hoteles más lujosos de la ciudad del Cusco como bartender. Ya son varios meses que trabaja en el hotel y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para hacer mantenimiento de su casa. Sofía es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Sofía continues to work as a manager of a condominium and in one of the most luxurious hotels in the city of Cuzco as a bartender. She has been working in the hotel for several months and it is going well for her. At this time, she needs the loan to do maintenance on her home. Sofía is a member of the “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” group, made up of members who live in the town of Rumichaca Baja where they carry out their economic activities.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her home.

loans.name: Ndue

texts.en:
Ndue, 46, is married and has three school-aged children, ages 17, 15, and 13. They live in a small city in the northern region of Albania. 

Ndue has been practicing welding for the last five years, and he finds himself passionate about his profession.  His clientele has grown throughout the years, thanks to his work and attributes. While his immediate goals include expanding his activity, his long-term goals include improving his family’s living conditions because they are not good, according to him.

This loan would be his first one, yet Ndue wants to assure lenders that he will pay the monthly installments on time.

loans.use: to buy welding tools.

loans.name: Blanca Isvelia

texts.es: Blanca compró cantidades de yogourt, suero costeño, por tanques, agregó tambien queso, crema de leche y los vendió rapidamente, generando mayores utilidades para su negocio  y esto fue gracias a su credikiva anterior. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva,  con el cual comprará nuevos productos lácteos por volumenes superiores a su capacidad, para ganar descuentos. Con la inversión de su credikiva aprovechará la temporada navideña y de año nuevo, para hacer de este apoyo financiero una inversión muy exitosa. Ella envia un mensaje de "Agradecimientos, son un apoyo, que es fundamental para las empresarias colombianas y felicitaciones por esa labor. "
texts.en: Blanca bought quantities of yogurt and whey by the tank, and also cheese and cream, and sold them quickly, generating more profit for her business.  This is due to her previous Kiva loan.  She is now applying for a new Kiva loan, with which she will buy new dairy products in the largest volumes that she has the capacity for, in order to obtain discounts. With the investment of her Kiva loan she will take advantage of the Christmas and New Year seasons, in order to make this investment very successful.  She sends a message of "Gratitude, you are a support, which is fundamental for Colombian entrepreneurs and congratulations on this work".

loans.use: to buy dairy products in greater volumes.

loans.name: Henry Francisco

texts.es:
Henry Francisco tiene 22 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive en la casa con los abuelos en ventanas provincia de los ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC 26 DE NOVIEMBRE, se traslado del recinto las blancas al recinto el Achotillo porque se encuentra más cerca de la cooperativa, El recinto pertenece al Cantón ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica  a labores pecuarias y agrícolas.

Henry Francisco se dedica a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol suave, Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, semillas, ranger, líquido mata maleza. Las compras las realiza en Ventanas.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los insumos. El sueño es poder tener una casa una familia y un vehículo.  propio. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es trabajar siempre con humildad y responsabilidad.

En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el futbol y ser unido con la comunidad.
texts.en:
Henry Franciso, 22, is single and has no children.  He lives in a house with his grandparents in Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

He's a member of 26 de Noviembre Communal Bank.  He moved from the Las Blancas precinct to the Achotillo precinct because it's closer to the cooperative.  The precinct is in Ventanas Canton.  This bank works in livestock and agriculture. 

Henry Francisco makes a living growing corn, rice, and beans.  He's requesting the loan to buy urea, seeds, Ranger [herbicide], and liquid weedkiller.  He makes his sales in Ventanas.  With the help of the loan he'll be able to buy the supplies.

His dream is to be able to have a house, a family, and a vehicle.  The challenge he faces is to always work modestly and responsibly.  In his free time he likes to play soccer and get together with the community.

loans.use: to buy urea, seeds, herbicide, and weedkiller

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es:
Cristina nació en la provincia de Urubamba pero vive en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja. Este pueblo se localiza en el distrito de Urubamba, provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco, Perú. Cristina  se dedica a la agricultura y ganadería. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la agricultura y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar semillas y abonos. 
Cristina es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Cristina was born in the province of Urubamba but lives in the community of Rumichaca Baja.  This town is located in the district of Urubamba in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco, Peru.  Cristina makes a living in agriculture and livestock.  She has been in agriculture for several years and it's going very well for her.

She needs a loan now to buy seeds and fertilizer.

Cristina's a member of Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja Group, made up of members who lives in the town of Rumichaca Baja, where they carry out their work.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel incrementó su volumen de ventas de productos confeccionados en su taller, esto fue gracias a su anterior credikiva, con el que duplicó su capacidad  compra y pudo fabricar muchos mas productos. Ahora cuenta con un inventario mayor y con muchos pedidos especialmente para la época navideña y de fin de año que llega con nuevos sueños y mucha fiesta, en la cual sus clientes necesitan estar bien elegantes para disfrutar en familia y esperar el año 2013. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará retales de telas, hilos, botones, que le facilitarán el cumplir compromisos actuales adquiridos, pues aumentará su capacidad de compra. Ella envía el siguiente mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva: Gracias y que sigan apoyando a los pequeñas microempresarias, que a futuro serán las grandes empresas de Colombia. “
texts.en:
Thanks to her previous Kiva loan, Isabel increased her sales of products she made in her shop.  She doubled her buying capacity and was able to make many more products.  Now she has a bigger inventory with a lot of orders especially for the Christmas and end-of-year season that comes with new dreams and a lot of parties, for which her customers need to be very elegant to enjoy with their families and wait for 2013.

This is why she's requesting another Kiva loan to buy fabric remnants, thread, and buttons.  This will enable her to fulfill her current orders because it will increase her buying capacity.

She sends the following message to Kiva lenders: "Thank you, and may you continue supporting small businesses, which in the future will be the big companies of Colombia."

loans.use: to buy fabric remnants, thread, and buttons

loans.name: Senaida

texts.es: Senaida continúa con la venta de verduras, la venta de chicha y engorde de ganado. Ya son varios años que se dedica a la crianza de animales y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Senaida es una mujer emprendedora y trabajadora que saca adelante a su familia. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar cuyes. Senaida es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en: Senaida is continuing with vegetable and chicha [a drink made from maize] sales and fattening livestock.  She has raised animals for several years.  It is going very well thanks to the effort that she puts into her work.  She is an enterprising and hard-working woman who takes good care of her family.  She needs this loan to buy guinea pigs.  Senaida is a member of the group, "Los Girasoles de Rumichacha Baja," which is made up of members who live in the town of Rumichacha Baja and carry out their work there.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis Antonio tiene 25 años de edad de estado civil soltero no tiene hijos, vive en casa de sus padres. Vive en Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos.

Ventanilla 26 DE NOVIEMBRE  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto el achotillo se traslado de recinto porque le queda más cerca a la Cooperativa, este Recinto pertenece al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Luis Antonio se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul, además se dedica a la crianza de cerdos y gallinas las compras y las ventas las realiza en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos orgánicos, urea, insecticidas entre los más usados  para el cuidado de los cultivos. El préstamo le ayudado para aumentar los ingresos de la familia y para invertir en la siembra en semillas e insumos.  Su sueño es comprar una casa un terreno y un carro.

En los tiempos libres le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Luis Antonio, 25, is single living with his parents; he has no children. He lives in Ventanas in the Los Ríos Province. 

The “26 de Noviembre” communal bank is located in the El Achotillo District. He moved districts in order to be closer to the Cooperative. This district is part of Cantón Ventanas. This communal bank is dedicated to to short cycle corn, rice and pigeon pea farming. 

Luis Antonio is a corn, rice and pigeon pea farmer, as well as a pig and chicken farmer. he buys and sells in Ventanas. 

The loan will be used to buy seeds, fertilizer, organic fertilizers, urea and insecticide that are commonly used for crops. 

The loan has helped him increase the family income and to invest seeds and supplies. 

His dream is to buy a house, a plot of land and a car. During his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, organic fertilizers, urea and insecticide.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es:
La socia Lucila pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo”,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de auto partes de automoviles como parabrisas,llantas entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de parabrisas para su negocio.

La socia Lucila se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Lucila belongs to the communal bank, "Santo Domingo."  She is continuing with her business of selling parts for cars like windshields, tires, etc.  She is a responsible and perservering person, and being this way is how she takes good care of her family.  She has had this business for years, and it is going well thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day.  She is requesting te loan to buy windshields for her business.  She is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy windshields for her business.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La socia Paulina pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo",la socia continua con su negocio de venta de juguetes y venta de artesania ,la socia vende lo que son muñecas,carros entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia lleva años en su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a cada negocio.

La socia Paulina solicita el préstamo para comprar chompas de alpaca para su negocio de venta de artesania. 
La socia Paulina se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Paulina belongs to the communal bank "Santo Domingo".  She continues in her business of selling toys and handicrafts.  She sells dolls and trucks, among others.  She is a responsible and determined person, feeling that in being like this, she is able to move her family forward.  She has been in this business for years and it is going well thanks to the determination she brings to each business each day.  

Paulina requests a loan to buy alpaca sweaters for her business in selling handicrafts.

Paulina feels thankful for the loan and pledges to meet the repayments.

loans.use: to buy alpaca sweaters for her business in selling handicrafts.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis  tiene 25 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene una hija, vive con la esposa y con la hija en el Cantón Ventanas provincia de los Ríos. 

VRC CEVALLOS, SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO SAN FRANCISCO, PERTENECE A LA PARROQUIA SAN JUAN DE PUEBLO VIEJO SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

Luis Alfredo se dedica a la cría de animales como gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, patos, cerdos y alimentacion.Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar mas animales para la cría. 

El sueño es comprar una casa.En su tiempo libre caminar con la hija.
texts.en:
Luis is 25 years old, lives in a free union, and has a daughter.  He lives with his wife and daughter in Ventanas Canton in the Los Ríos Province.

Cevallos Communal Bank is located in the rural community of San Francisco, in the parish of San Juan de Pueblo Viejo.  Its members make their living doing agricultural work.

Luis Alfredo makes his living raising animals such as hens and pigs.  He is applying for a loan to buy chickens, ducks, pigs and feed.  With the support of the loan, he will be able to buy more animals to raise.  His dream is to buy a house.  In his free time, he walks with his daughter.

loans.use: to buy chickens, ducks, pigs and feed.

loans.name: Yoni

texts.es:
La socia Yoni pertenece al banco comunal “Santo Domingo”,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de salchipapas  y pollipapas,la socia lleva años en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende en una carreta especial para este tipo de platos ,la socia vende en la puerta de su casa,siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de insumos para su negocio como aceite,papas entre otros. 

La socia Yoni se siente agradecida por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yoni is a member of the “Santo Domingo” communal bank and she sells salchipapas and pollipapas and has been doing this for many years.  Things are going well for her thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business.  She sells door to door from a cart made especially for these types of dishes.  This is how she gets ahead with her family.

She is asking for this loan so that she can buy supplies such as cooking oil and potatoes among other things.  Yoni is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Nellys Yolanda

texts.es: Nellys comrpró una maquina de coser y esto es gracias a su credikiva que permitió que cumpliera su sueño de avanzar en su negocio; Ella está muy agradecida por los préstamos y espera seguir trabajando con esos recursos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará materiales para elaborar con sus propias manos artesanias, pues las vacaciones de fin de año traen cosigo mucha clientela y esto es justamente lo que lla necesita para hacer crecer su negocio. Gracias a su credikiva puede comprar en mayor volumen y dar respuesta a la demanda de fin de año, por eso está aplicando a un nuevo finaciamiento tendrá mucho y diversos colores de hilos para hacer los bolsos en mayor volumen, que tiene encargado y que garantizan el éxito de su credikiva..
texts.en:
Nellys bought a sewing machine with her previous Kiva loan and this allowed her to fulfill her dream of making progress in her business.  She is very grateful for the loans she has received and she hopes to continue working with these resources. 

Nellys is currently applying for a new Kiva loan which she will use to buy materials for making her own hand-made creations.  The end-of-year holiday period brings her a lot of customers and this is just what she needs to grow her business.  Thanks to her Kiva loan, Nellys will be able to buy in larger quantities and thereby meet her end-of-year demand.  She is applying for a new loan so that she will have a lot of threads in different colors available for making more bags which she has orders for.  This will guarantee the success of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy different colored threads for making bags in larger quantities

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia pertence al banco comunal SANTO DOMINGO,el banco se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, provincia  de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Bernardina tiene 50 años de edad,04 hijos y es conviviente,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de granos ,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia vende en uno de los mercados de la ciudad del Cusco,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia como trigo,moraya,tarwi entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Bernardina belongs to the 'Santo Domingo' community bank which is located in Cusco district, in Cusco province and department.

Bernardina is 50 years old, lives with her partner, and has four children.  She divides her time between her daily activities and her business buying and selling grains.  She has been in this business for years and it is doing well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day.  Bernardina sells her produce in one of the markets in the city of Cusco.  She is a responsible, diligent person and this is how she provides for her family.

Bernardina is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as wheat, dehydrated potato, tarwi (an Andean lupine with an edible bean), etc.

Bernardina is grateful for the loan she is receiving and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as wheat, dehydrated potato, tarwi, etc.

loans.name: Wilson Enrique

texts.es: Wilson compró harina de trigo levadura, queso grasas y también remodeló el local y esto fue gracias a su credikiva, con el cual ahora se siente más cómodo y contó con mayor inventario de productos terminados, que vendió y ganó un poco mas. Su nuevo crédito, al que está aplicando, lo invertirá en la compra de  materias primas que requiere para la temporada navideña, pues preparará los mejores panes postres y ponqués, con el sabor y la apariencia de a esta época: pan navideño, el año viejo etc. son nombres típicos de los productos que fabricará. Tambien comprará un horno de segunda mano en buen estado, con el cual planea aumentar la producción.  Wilson envía un mensaje a los financiadoras de Kiva : “ Agradezco el apoyo recibido y deseo para los financiadores muchas bendiciones. “
texts.en:
Thanks to his Kiva loan, Wilson bought yeast wheat flour, cheese, fat, and he also remodeled his store. Now he feels more comfortable since he had a greater inventory of finished goods which he sold to earn a bit more.

The new loan he is applying for is to be invested in the purchase of raw baking materials required for the Christmas season, since he will prepare the best breads, desserts and cakes with the flavor and appearance of this period: Christmas bread, the Old Year, etc. are typical names for the products he will make.

He will also buy a second-hand oven in good condition, with which he plans to increase production. Wilson sends this message to the Kiva lenders: "I appreciate the support I've received and I send many blessings to the lenders."

loans.use: to buy raw baking materials for the Christmas season, and an oven

loans.name: Yenny Edelmira

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,la socia vende desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,la socia tambien se dedica al trabajo como profesora del nivel inicial,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 1:00 p.m como profesora y desde las 3:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m trabaja en su restaurant,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos para cocinar como verduras,pollo y carne.
