La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member is still working in her restaurant business. The restaurant sells breakfasts, lunches and dinners. She also works as an elementary school teacher, from 8am to 1pm. From 3pm to 8pm, she works in the restaurant. 

She has been operating this business for 7 years, and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her restaurant business. She is requesting the loan to buy produce to cook, such as vegetables, chicken and meat.

She is very happy to have this opportunity and promises to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy produce to cook with, such as vegetables, chicken and meat

loans.name: Bernardina

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de productos naturales a base de hierbas que son utiles para la salud,la socia tambien sigue trabajando en un consultorio dental,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de venta de productos naturales.La socia solicita el credito para comprar productos naturales.

La socia esta feliz con el credito ys e compromete a cumplir los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
The member is continuing with her business selling natural herbal products that are useful for health. She is also still working in a dental office. She has already been in this business for seven years and it is going very well. Her dream is to expand her natural products sales business. 

She is requesting the loan to purchase natural products. She is happy with the loan and is committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy natural herbal products to sell

loans.name: Nancy Guadalupe

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “LIDERANDO LAS PALMERAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy Guadalupe; La socia continua con su negocio de hospedaje siendo ella la que administra,la socia a la vez continua con su negocio de venta de cosmeticos como cremas,perfumes entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo trabajando y con su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone a cada una de sus actividades, siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de productos cosmeticos como perfumes y colonias.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank “Liderando Las Palmeras”. The bank is located in Cusco, in the Cusco province which is in the Cusco region.

Her name is Nancy Guadalupe. She still has a boarding-house business, which she manages herself. At the same time, she also operates a business selling cosmetics, including creams and perfumes. She has been working and running a business for a long time. It is going very well thanks to the hard work she puts into both activities. This is how she provides for her family.

She is requesting this loan to buy cosmetic products, such as perfumes and colognes.

She is grateful to those who share her dream in this way and promises to make the necessary payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy cosmetic products, such as perfumes and colognes

loans.name: Rosa Lilian

texts.es: Rosa Lilian de cuarenta y tres años de edad vive junto a su padre y sus hijos en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas en el lugar de su residencia, tiene varios años de trabajar con el pequeño negocio y ha adquirido experiencia valiosa que le permite agilizar la producción, gracias al buen manejo de la venta siempre obtiene las mejores ganancias, la comunidad donde vive es muy transitada y ya tiene mucha clientela, todos la prefieren porque su producto es de calidad, a un precio accesible y sobre todo con el servicio mas rápido del lugar; Rosa es una mujer activa, decidida y muy dedicada a su labor, desea salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños por eso todos los días se esfuerza al máximo en el trabajo pues sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito que tanto espera, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, 	quesillo, chicharrón, frijoles etc. Rosa Lilian tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
Rosa Lilian is forty-three years old and live with her father and children in her own house. She makes a living selling pupusas from her home. She has worked at this small business for several years and has acquired valuable experience that has allowed her to be flexible in her production. Thanks to her good sales management she has made a better profits. The community she lives in is well trafficked and as a result she has a lot of customers. They all prefer her due to her quality products, accessible prices, and above all, because she has the fastest service in the area. 

Rosa is an active and decisive woman who is very dedicated to her work. She hopes to get ahead and achieve her dreams which is why gives her full effort everyday in her work because she knows that this is the only way to obtain the success she really wants. 

In the past weeks her demand has increased and she wants to take the opportunity to make a new investment, however, she does not have enough capital backing. This is why she has requested a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to purchase corn, cheese, pork rinds, beans, etc. Rosa has good payment references and is very responsible. She assures that she will be able to repay the debt and she has faith that she will bring financial security to her household.

loans.use: to purchase corn, cheese, pork rinds, and beans

loans.name: Simeona

texts.es:
La socia Simeona pertenece al banco comunal “Mi Perú”,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de granos secos,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de quinua, moraya, maiz, habas  entre otros.


La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Simeona belongs to the communal bank “Mi Perú”.  She continues in her business of selling dried grains.  She is a responsible and determined person, feeling that in being this way, she can move her family forward.  She has been working in this field for years, and her business is going well thanks to the determination she brings to her business each day.  

She is requesting a loan to buy quinoa, dried white potatoes, corn, and beans, among others.  

She feels grateful for this opportunity being given to her in this manner. She promises to complete her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy quinoa, dried white potatoes, corn, and beans, among others.

loans.name: Liliana

texts.es: Liliana de 31 años de edad se dedica al comercio de ropa en todas las tallas y líneas, mediante  distribución a crédito, entre clientes vecinos y amigos o referidos por estos. Sus principales compras las hace en almacenes de telas en la ciudad de Barranquilla. Su idea de negocio comenzó en el mes de Enero del año 2007, cuando se encontraba en la búsqueda de un empleo formal y decidió por cuenta propia solicitar el servicio de fabricación de camisas y pantalones, para caballeros y blusas femeninas, que manda a fabricar  en talleres satélites que le ofrecerle el servicio mediante el sistema de maquila( es decir ella invierte en materias primas e insumos y pequeños talleres hacen el proceso de diseño, corte, preparación, ensamble, acabado de piezas y finalmente ella vende sobre pedidos. En el pasado Liliana viajó a España, mediante financiamiento que hizo a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, participando en una misión de conocimiento y tecnología, donde se capacitó mucho más y conoció diversas alternativas de trabajo en el área de la confección. Su meta mas adelante es abrir un almacén y  su meta personal es contraer matrimonio y conformar una familia. En la actualidad  está aplicando aun credikiva, segundo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará telas, accesorios para acabados y pagar mano de obra a los talleres, que fabricarán ropa,  especialmente dirigida a que sus clientes celebren las navidades y el año nuevo muy elegantes y disfruten en familia estas festividades.
texts.en:
Liliana, 31, makes a living selling clothing in all sizes and lines.  She distributes on credit to neighbors, friends, and referrals.  She makes her main purchases in fabric stores in the city of Barranquilla.

Her business idea started in January 2007, when she was looking for a formal job and decided on her own to request the service of making shirts and pants for men and blouses for women, which she orders from satellite workshops that offer the service as an assembly system.  (That is, she invests in the raw materials and supplies, and small workshops do the design, cutting, making, assembling, and finishing of the pieces, and ultimately she sells on order.)

In the past Liliana traveled to Spain with financing from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to participate in a learning and technology mission.  She trained a lot more and learned various work alternatives in the field of sewing.  Her long-term goal is to open a large store and her personal goal is to get married and have a family.

Currently she's applying for a Kiva loan, her second loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.  With it she'll buy fabric and accessories for the finishing touches, and she'll pay for labor at the workshops, which will make the clothing especially so her customers can celebrate Christmas and New Year very elegantly and enjoy these festivities with their families.

loans.use: to buy fabric and accessories, and to pay for labor

loans.name: Grupo Hatarinas Group

texts.es: ¡Saludos, desde Perú! La Srta. Kristian Paola es una mujer aguerrida y luchadora que trabaja todos los días vendiendo productos de consumo humano en una pequeña bodega. Ella tiene 21 años, es soltera y pertenece al “GRUPO HATARINAS” que está compuesto por 5 socios muy emprendedores. Paola es aquella mujer que viste de polo manga larga de color rosado y es la primera en la parte derecha de la foto. El presente préstamo es para poder abastecer su bodega con los productos que salen con una mayor frecuencia por víspera navideñas como panetones, leche, tabletas de chocolates, etc. El “GRUPO HATARINAS” y en especial la Srta. Kristian Paola agradecen a todos aquellos inversionistas que a través de KIVA y EDAPROSPO depositaron su confianza.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru! 
Kristian Paola is a brave and determined woman who works every day selling food products from her small store. She is 21 years old, single, and a member of "Grupo Hatarinas", which consists of five entrepreneurial members. Paola is the woman on the right of the photo who is wearing the  pink long-sleeved shirt . This loan is to be used to stock her store with the products that are in high demand in the holiday season such as panettones, milk, chocolate bars etc. The Grupo Hatarinas, and, in particular, Kristian Paola, are grateful to the lenders who put their trust in them through Kiva and EDAPROSPO.

loans.use: to buy goods for her general store like panettones and milk etc.

loans.name: Corina

texts.es:
La socia Corina pertenece al banco comunal “Mi Perú”,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de tara y cochinilla,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia exporta estos productos al pais de Alemania siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el prestamo para la compra de tara y cochinilla para su negocio. 

La socia Corina se encuentra agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Corina belongs to the communal bank "Mi Perú”, and continues in her business of selling tara (a small tree) and cochineal (an insect whose extract can be used for dye).  She has worked in this field for years and her business is going well thanks to the determination she brings each day to her business.  She exports these products to Germany, feeling that in doing so, she is able to move her family forward.

She requests a loan to buy tara and cochineal for her business.  

Corina is thankful for the opportunity offered to her through this loan and is committed to making her payments according to the established schedule.

loans.use: to buy tara and cochineal for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es:
La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de restaurant,la socia prepara desayunos,almuerzos y cenas,al socia prepara sopas,estofado de pollo,pollo al horno entre otros platos,la socia ya tiene 7 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de restaurant.La socia solicita le credito para comprar productos para cocinar como pollo,carne y verduras.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member continues working in her restaurant business.  She prepares breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  She makes soups, chicken stew, and baked chicken, among other dishes.  She has been in this business for seven years and everything is going well.  Her dream is to grow her restaurant business.  

She is requesting a loan to buy cooking ingredients, like chicken, meat, and vegetables.  

She is happy for the loan and promises to pay the established installments.

loans.use: to buy cooking ingredients, like chicken, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Claudia

texts.es:
La socia Claudia pertenece al banco comunal “Mi Perú”,la socia continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de arroz,aceite,leche entre otros para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Claudia is a member of the “Mi Peru” communal bank and she continues to sell primary needs products such as rice, sugar, milk, and other things.  She is a responsible and dedicated person and gets her family ahead in this way.  She has been in this business for some time and it’s gone well thanks to the daily effort she puts in.

She is asking for this loan to buy rice, cooking oil, milk and other things for her business.  She is grateful for this opportunity and promises to make her payments on schedule.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Oswaldo German

texts.es:
Oswaldo German tiene 40 años de estado civil actual union libre, vive con la pareja y con los hijos. Vive en el  Cantón Ventanas provincia los Ríos.

La ventanilla LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz, arroz fréjol y soya.

Oswaldo German se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Compra y vende los productos en Ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, abono, urea, líquidos  fertilizantes para la siembra del maíz. El préstamo le ayudado para comprar los fertilizantes que necesita para la siembra y aumentar los ingresos para el consumo de la familia. El sueño es poder comprarterrenos para aumentar las siembras y las ganancias.

En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar fútbol y compartir momentos agradables junto a la familia.
texts.en:
Oswaldo Germán, 40, is currently in a common-law marriage.  He lives with his partner and the children in Ventanas Canton, Los Ríos Province.  La Verdad Nos Hará Libres Communal Bank is located in Caimito Precinct in Ventanas Canton.  This bank works in short-cycle agricultural labor growing corn, rice, beans, and soy.

Oswaldo Germán makes a living growing corn, rice, beans, and soy.  He buys and sells his products in Ventanas.

He requested the loan to buy seeds, manure, urea, and liquid fertilizer for planting corn.  The loan has helped him buy the fertilizer he needs for the planting and increase his income for the family's use.

His dream is to be able to buy plots of land to increase his plantings and his profits.  In his free time he likes to play soccer and share a good time with his family.

loans.use: to buy manure, urea, and liquid fertilizers to plant corn.

loans.name: Lourdes Mabel

texts.es: La Srta. Lourdes es soltera, tiene 19 de edad,  Lourdes  estudia Administración ella eligió esta profesión porque  es su vocación y considera que es una chica creativa y moderna, Su sueño de Lourdes  es brindarle a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida y de alguna forma devolverle a ellos todo lo que hicieron por ella, con el fin de seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para pagar su matrícula y prácticas profesionales. Sabemos que Lourdes  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Kiva le ayudaran.
texts.en: Lourdes is single and is 19 years old.  Lourdes is studying administration.  She chose this profession because it is her vocation, and she considers herself to be a creative and modern young woman.  Lourdes' dream is to provide her parents with a better quality of life and to somehow give back to them all that they did for her.  With the goal of continuing to grow, she is requesting a new loan to pay for her tuition and professional training.  We know that Lourdes will achieve her goals with a lot of work and effort and that the loans from Kiva will help her.

loans.use: to pay for her tuition and professional training.

loans.name: Ermila

texts.es: Ermila continúa en el banco comunal y con la venta de desayunos, almuerzos y cenas.  En esta ocasión desea el crédito para comprar productos al por mayor como son sacos de  arroz, aceite en bidones, papa, carnes, verduras y otros productos. Ermila agradece el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Ermila is continuing with her communal bank and selling breakfast, lunch, and dinner.  On this occasion, she is hoping for a loan to buy products wholesale like sacks of rice, oil in drums, potatoes, meat, vegetables, etc.  She is thankful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy products wholesale like sacks of rice, oil in drums, potatoes, meat, vegetables, etc.

loans.name: Faneth Yolanda

texts.es: Faneth con su anterior credikiva, compró productos de belleza, calzado y ropa para caballeros, que vendió oportunamente y con lo cual ganó dinero. Con su anterior credikiva se le incrementaron sus ventas y utilidades, impactando mucho más su nivel de vida. Con su credikiva anterior pudo comprar a precios de promoción, productos en ofertas y esto fue bueno para su negocio. Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Agradezco mucho su ayuda de préstamo, espero que siempre me sigan apoyando “.En la actualidad Faneth está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará nuevos productos de belleza que tiene encargados, y que han llegado con muchos descuentos, para ayudarla a dar buenos precios a su clientela y  hacerlos cada vez mas fieles a su negocio.
texts.en: Faneth used her previous Kiva loan to buy beauty products, shoes and clothing for men, which she sold quickly and with which she earned money.  With her previous Kiva loan she increased her sales and profits, greatly impacting her quality of life.  With her previous Kiva loan she was able to buy at promotional and sales prices, and this was good for her business.  Her message for Kiva lenders is the following:  "I am very grateful for the help you provide, and hope that you will always continue supporting me."  Faneth is now applying for a new Kiva loan, with which she will buy new beauty products.  She has arranged good discounts on these products, in order to help her to offer good prices to her customers and make them more loyal to her business every time.

loans.use: to buy new beauty products.

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Con su anterior credikiva, Ana hizo adecuaciones a su vivienda, especialmente dirigida a los baños. Así mismo con este compró materias primas e inumos por bultos y preparó mucha masa con  maíz pilado, la cual  vendió oportunamente y a precios competitivos. Su negocio ha crecido en ventas y su vida está tranquila, porque no hace créditos a personas informales que le resultaban costosos y no la dejaban tener mas utilidades en su negocio. En la actualidad necesita una vez mas, un cedikiva para invertir en mayor volumen que el acostumbrado en materias primas, pues se acercan las fiestas de fin de año y los pedidos llegan en grandes volumenes. Tambien con su credikiva, hará mantenimiento preventivo a sus maquinarias y su éxito radica en su capaicdad de trabajo y en la clientela, la que cada vez mas crece a consecuencia de su sentido de responsbilidad y la calidad con la que trabaja.
texts.en: With her previous Kiva loan Ana made improvements to her home, especially to the bathrooms.  She also bought raw materials and supplies for pastries and prepared a lot of dough with corn, which she sold quickly and at good prices.  Her sales have increased and her life is calm, because she does not give credit to unreliable people which was costly for her before and did not allow her business to be profitable enough.  She now needs a Kiva loan once again to invest in a greater volume than usual of raw materials, because the New Year's holiday is approaching and a large volume of orders is arriving.  She will also use the Kiva loan to have preventive maintenance done on her machines.  Her success is rooted in her capacity for work and in her customers, the number of which increases every time due to her sense of responsibility and the quality of her work.

loans.use: to buy corn for pastries.

loans.name: Maria Edith

texts.es: María Edith vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus cinco hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la  venta de mariscos pescado seco, camarones, conchas entre otros, comercia de forma ambulante y desde su vivienda en una zona muy concurrida de personas, tiene varios años con la venta y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permita obtener las mejores ganancias ya tiene  mucha clientela fija porque es una excelente vendedora y porque todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, además se caracteriza por su gran amabilidad cuando atiende el negocio; María es una mujer ejemplar, siempre dedicada a su labor y a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan superarse y alcanzar el éxito en el futuro; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mariscos por mayor etc. María Edith tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, tiene confianza que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez ofrecerle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria Edith lives with her life partner and their five children in their own home.  She works selling seafood, dried fish, shrimp and shells, among other things.  She is a mobile vendor and works from her home in a very busy area. She has been selling for a number of years and has a lot of experience, which allows her to earn better profits.  She has many regular customers because she is an excellent saleswoman and because all of her products are of very good quality and at accessible prices.  She is also very friendly when she does business.  Maria is an exemplary woman, always dedicated to her work and on the lookout for opportunities that will allow her to get ahead and achieve success in the future.   She wants to grow her business but needs to invest in it.  For this reason she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, which will allow her to buy wholesale seafood, etc.  Maria Edith has good payment references and is very responsible.  She is confident that she will be able to settle the debt, and at the same time offer her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy wholesale seafood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy snook, red snapper, shrimp and fish filets, pomfret, crab, corvine etc. for her business.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es: Francisca nació en el distrito de Lamay en la provincia de Calca, ella continua en el banco comunal “Señor del Calvario” y con la venta de abarrotes y verduras. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar productos como arroz, azúcar, harinas, leches, fideos, hortalizas zanahorias, lechugas, repollo, cebollas, zanahorias y otros más. Francisca agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Francisca was born in the district of Lamay, province of Calca; she continues to be a member of the “Señor del Calvario” communal bank and with her small grocery and vegetable store.  At present, she needs a loan to buy products like rice, sugar, flour, milk, spaghetti, vegetables, carrots, lettuce, cabbage, onions, and other items. Francisca is grateful for the loan and is committed to meet all of her payment quotas according to the time specified.

loans.use: buy products like rice, sugar, flour, milk, spaghetti, vegetables, carrots, lettuce, cabbage, onions, and other items.

loans.name: Maria Vicenta

texts.es: María Vicenta de treinta y seis años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida Ezequiel y su hija en casa propia; ella se dedica al destazo de cerdo, tiene varios años de dedicarse al rubro y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia valiosa en el negocio que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia en diferentes alrededores cercanos al terreno de crianza y además vende en el mercado de la localidad  es muy conocida en la zona y se ha hecho de mucha clientela porque todo lo que comercia es de calidad, lo vende a un buen  precio y el servicio es excelente, María es una mujer ejemplar, entregada a su trabajo siempre está a la expectativa de nuevas oportunidades que le permitan salir adelante pues sabe que así podrá alcanzar el éxito, En esta última temporada tuvo algunas perdidas y tiene el deseo de recuperarse pero necesita invertir en insumos por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cerdos por mayor. María Vicenta tiene buenas referencias crediticias y tiene la certeza que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Vicenta is 36 years old and lives together with her life partner Ezequiel and their daughter in their own home. Her work is butchering pigs. 

She has worked in this line of work for many years and has acquired a lot of valuable experience that allows her to make better earnings. She sells in the different areas surrounding the pig raising area. She also sells in the local market. She is well known in her area and has acquired a lot of customers because all of her products are high quality. She sells at a good price and her service is excellent. Maria is an exemplary woman, devoted to her work. She is always looking out for new opportunities that would allow her to get ahead. She knows that this way, she will be able to achieve success. 

In this latest season she had some losses and wants to recover. She needs to invest in the raw materials, which is why she is requesting a loan from Integral for a loan that would allow her to purchase wholesale pigs. Maria Vicenta has a good credit record and is certain that she will be able to pay off the debt, and at the same time, is confident that she will be able to give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: purchase wholesale pigs

loans.name: Silia Nohemy

texts.es: Silia Nohemy de veinticuatro años de edad vive junto a sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la  venta de mariscos pescado, cangrejos, camarones entre otros, comercia de forma ambulante y desde su vivienda todos los alredores de la localidad donde reside la zona es muy concurrida de personas, tiene varios años con la venta y se ha hecho de mucha experiencia que le permita obtener las mejores ganancias ya tiene  mucha clientela por ser una excelente vendedora y porque todo lo que comercia es de muy buena calidad y a precios accesibles, además se caracteriza por su excelente servicio ;Silia es una mujer emprendedora, siempre dedicada a su labor y a la expectativa de oportunidades que le permitan superarse y alcanzar el éxito en el futuro; quiere hacer crecer el negocio pero necesita invertir por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mariscos por mayor etc. Silia Nohemy tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, tiene fe que podrá saldar la deuda, y a la vez sabe que asi podrá ofrecerle a su familia una vida plena.
texts.en:
Silia Nohemy is 24 years old and lives with her children in a home of her own.  She sells seafood such as fish, crabs, shrimp, and other things.  She sells on foot and from her home.  The whole area where she lives is well travelled through.  She’s been doing this for 20 years and this has provided her with lots of experience that have allowed her to have better earnings.  She has many customers because she is an excellent saleswoman and because everything she sells is of very good quality, good prices, and she gives excellent service.

Silia is a very enterprising woman, dedicated to her work, who takes advantage of opportunities that allow her to be successful in the future.  She wants to grow her business so she approached INTEGRAL for a loan so that she can buy seafood in quantity.  Silia Nohemy has good payment references and is very responsible.  She is confident that she will get out of debt and be able to provide her family with a good life.

loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Elizabeth Noemi

texts.es: Buenas tardes: Elizabeth una mujer trabajadora de 43 años, casada con 02 hijos en etapa escolar.  Hace 05 años Elizabeth brinda servicio de costura,  en un puesto que alquila en un mercado. Este negocio surgió con la idea de contar un negocio propio,  actualmente nos manifiesta que realiza pedidos de fundas, sabanas, manteles entre otros. El dinero que percibe lo destina para algunos  gastos del hogar, y materiales de su negocio. Solicito el crédito para la compra de telas, y así entregar a tiempo sus pedidos. Su mayor deseo es de comprar su propio puesto de costura. Elizabeth agradece a los prestamistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada, pues le permite seguir mejorando.
texts.en: Good afternoon. Elizabeth is a hard-working woman of 43 years of age. She is married with 2 school-age children. For the past 5 years Elizabeth has been offering a sewing service at a stand that she rents at the market. This idea occurred to her because she wanted to start her own business. At the moment, she says that she sews pillow cases, sheets and tablecloths, among other things. She spends the money that she earns to pay for some of her household expenses and also to buy materials for her business. Elizabeth is applying for this loan to buy fabrics, in order to be able to deliver her orders on time. Her greatest wish would be to buy her own sewing stand. Elizabeth is grateful to the Kiva lenders for their help, as it enables her to carry on making improvements.

loans.use: to buy fabrics.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for oral surgery.

loans.name: Petrona

texts.es: Petrona continua con la venta de comida típica (pollo frito, trucha frita, tallarín con pollo, rocoto relleno, caldo de cabeza, adobo, chuleta frita, papa a la huancaína, habas hucho, chiriuchu y otras más). Ya son varios años que se dedica a los negocios y le va muy bien. Petrona en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos (sacos de arroz, sacos de  azúcar, aceite, verduras y otras cosas) para preparar más platos de comida. Petrona es integrante del grupo “Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja” lo conforman socios que viven en el poblado de Rumichaca Baja y donde realizan sus actividades económicas.
texts.en:
Petrona continues to sell typical food (fried chicken, fried trout, chicken with noodles, stuffed peppers, sheep's head soup, adobo (spicy pork), fried chops, huancaína potatoes, huacho lima beans, chiriuchu (a dish made from corn tortilla, chicken, toasted corn, pork sausage, cheese and baked guinea pig), and others.  She has had these businesses for several years, and it is going very well for her.

On this occasion Petrona needs the loan to buy supplies (sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, cooking oil, vegetables, and other things) in order to prepare more food dishes.

Petrona is a member of the "Los Girasoles de Rumichaca Baja" communal bank, made up of members who live in the Rumichaca Baja settlement, where they carry on their business activities.

loans.use: to buy sacks of rice, sacks of sugar, cooking oil, vegetables, and other things.

loans.name: Lorena Elizabeth

texts.es:
La Señora Lorena se dedica a la elaboración y venta de golosinas y comida, actividad que realiza desde su casa de habitación desde hace 15 años, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y de sus hijos.  
Doña Lorena sus principales clientes son los amigos y vecinos de su colonia, su casa esta ubicada en la calle principal donde el trafico de personas y de taxistas es mayor y en las cercanías de su casa funciona una fabrica de tabacos lo que le incrementa sus ganancias.
Doña Lorena realiza sus ventas en horas de la tarde y aprovecha cuando los trabajadores de la fábrica salen de sus jornadas para ofrecer su producto. También se dedica a la venta de ropa nueva y celulares pero su actividad principal es la elaboración y venta de golosinas y comidas.
Doña Lorena es una persona muy luchadora, amable y alegre lo que le permite que sus clientes la prefieran, está solicitando el préstamo para la compra de manteca, huevos, frijoles, tortillas, queso, carne, limones, arroz, papas, yuca, sal, etc. insumos que necesita para elaborar sus golosinas y aprovechar la temporada navideña para incrementar sus ventas.


 
Danlí, Honduras – Noviembre del 2012
texts.en:
Lorena prepares and sells sweets and food for a living. She has been running this business from home for the past 15 years, with the help of her husband and children. Lorena’s main customers are her friends and neighbours from the area where she lives. Her house is on the main street where there is good passing trade: people, taxi drivers, and the tobacco factory near her house increases hers profits. Lorena sells in the afternoon, taking advantage of the time when the factory workers finish their working day, to offer them her wares on their way home. She also sells new clothes and mobile phones, but her main business activity is the preparation of sweets and food. Lorena is a spirited, friendly and cheerful person, which means that her customers prefer her. She is applying for the loan to buy fat, eggs, beans, tortillas, cheese, meat, lemons, rice, potatoes, cassava, salt, etc. - basic ingredients that she needs to prepare her sweets and take advantage of the Christmas period to increase her sales.

Danli, Honduras – November 2012.

loans.use: to buy fat, eggs, beans, tortillas, cheese, meat, lemons, rice, potatoes, cassava, salt etc., for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to paint her house and buy a window.

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es: Sandra Elizabeth vive junto a su hija en casa propia, ella se dedica a la venta de pan dulce tortas secas, pastelitos, quesadillas entre otros, tiene varios años de trabajar con el pequeño negocio y ha adquirido experiencia valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias comercia de forma ambulante en todos los alrededores de la zona donde vive, ya tiene mucha clientela, aunque sus mejores clientes son los vecinos, todos la prefieren porque su producto es de calidad, a un precio accesible y sobre todo con un buen servicio, Sandra es una mujer activa, decidida y muy dedicada a su labor, desea salir adelante y cumplir sus sueños por eso todos los días se esfuerza al máximo en el trabajo pues sabe que solo así alcanzara el éxito que tanto espera, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda debido a la temporada y quiere aprovechar para una nueva inversión, pero no posee de suficiente capital que la respalde por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar pan dulce por mayor etc. Sandra Elizabeth tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Sandra Elizabeth lives in her own house with her daughter.  She works selling sweet bread, cakes and quesadillas, among other things.  She has had this little business for some years and has acquired valuable experience, allowing her to earn the highest possible profits.  Sandra Elizabeth is a street vendor and works in the area surrounding her home and has a lot of customers.  Although her best customers are her neighbours, everybody buys from Sandra Elizabeth because she sells quality products at affordable prices and, more than this, she provides good service.  She is an active woman, who is determined in and dedicated to her work.  She wants to prosper and achieve her dreams so every day she puts in the maximum effort at work.  She knows that this is the only way to have the success that she hopes for.  In the last few weeks, demand has increased because of the holidays and she would like to take the opportunity to invest some more.  However, she does not have enough capital so Sandra Elizabeth is applying for a loan with INTEGRAL so she can buy sweet bread in bulk.  Sandra Elizabeth has a good credit rating and is very responsible.  She assures us she will pay off her debt and, at the same time, she has faith that this will bring her financial security at home.

loans.use: to buy sweet bread in bulk.

loans.name: Diro Enrique

texts.es: Don Dirii dice que los préstamos facilitan los procesos a los pequeños comerciante, se insentiva la microempresa y su negocio progresa con ese capital, por eso se encuentra agradecido con su credikiva, poque con su inversión pasada compró víveres y adecuó sus instalaciones locativas y esto lo puso muy contento. En la actualidad está aplicndo a un nuevo credikiva con el cual comprará una parte en licores y bebidas y la otra parte en la educación de su hija; Así se prepara para las fiestas decembrinas, donde aspira  hacer su mejor venta del año y con ello apoyar  la educación de su hija, con la que sueña ver convertida a futura en persona exitosa.
texts.en: Diro says that the loans facilitate progress for small businesspeople, provide incentives for microenterprises and allow businesses to progress with the capital.  For this reason he is grateful for his Kiva loan, because with his previous investment he bought provisions and improved his rented premises, and this made him very happy.  He is now applying for a new Kiva loan with which he will buy liquor with one part, and spend the rest on his daughter's education.  Thus he is preparing for the December holidays, when he hopes to have his best sales of the year and with this support the education of his daughter, whom he hopes to see become a successful person in future.

loans.use: to buy liquor with a part of the loan, and with the rest support his daughter's education.

loans.name: Club De La Amistad Group

texts.es: Este es Grupo Club de la Amistad que conforman 09 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Francisca tiene 40 años, conviviente con 03 hijos en etapa escolar, forma parte de la directiva y es la que preside al Grupo. Desde hace mas de 15 años Francisca cuenta con una bodega de primera necesidad. Francisca ha solicitado el préstamo para la compra de azúcar, leche, paneton. El sueño de Francisca es de terminar de construir para que sus hijos tengan una mejor calidad de vida. Francisca está muy contenta con este préstamo y agradece a Kiva. Francisca se encuentra ubicada en la parte de adelante es la segunda del lado derecho viste polo rosado, chompa celeste.
texts.en:
This is the "Club de la Amistad" (Friendship Club) Group, which has nine members who make a living in various commercial activities.

Francisca is 40 years old and lives with her three school-age children. She is a member of the board and chairs the Group. 

For over 15 years, Francisca has owned a grocery store selling basic items. She has requested this loan to buy sugar, milk and Paneton (Peruvian Christmas cake). 

Francisca's dream is to accomplish her aims for her children have a better quality of life. Francisca is very happy about this loan and thanks Kiva.  Francisca is in the front row of the photograph, second from the right, wearing a pink t-shirt and blue sweater.

loans.use: to buy sugar, milk and Paneton.

loans.name: Guillermina Olga

texts.es: Buenas tardes. Guillermina es una madre carismática que a sus 64 años  ha logrado cumplir con algunos de sus sueños como mejorar su vivienda apoyar a sus hijos en su educación. Lleva más de 10 años dedicándose a la venta de postres como queques, pasteles, tortas y picarones lo cual lo realiza ambulatoriamente. Se siente feliz, ya que muy aparte de generar ingresos con su trabajo, es lo que le gusta hacer. Solicito el crédito para la compra de una licuadora, tazones y bandejas y así tener la facilidad de preparar sus postres. Su mayor deseo es de poner un puesto donde pueda exhibir sus productos. Guillermina es separada y tiene 04 hijos independientes. Agradece a los prestamistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada.
texts.en:
Good day. 

Guillermina is a charismatic mother who, at the age of 64, has managed to achieve some of her dreams, such as making home improvements and supporting her children through education. 

For over 10 years, she has made a living selling desserts including buns, pies, cakes and picarones, a type of Peruvian doughnut. She sells these in the street. She is happy, because apart from making money from her work, it is what she enjoys doing. 

She is requesting a loan to buy a blender, bowls and trays, making it easier to prepare her desserts. Her biggest dream is to have a stand where she can exhibit her products.

Guillermina is separated and has four children, who are all independent. She thanks Kiva lenders for the help they offer.

loans.use: to buy a blender, bowls and trays.

loans.name: Ermes Sandro

texts.es: El señor Sandro es casado y tiene tres hijos. El y su familia con mucho esfuerzo luego de vivir varios años en alquiler ha logrado comprarse su lote de terreno ubicado en la zona norte de la ciudad a 45 minutos de la misma, ahora el esta esforzándose por dar mejor condiciones a su familia mejorando los cuartos donde vive  es para este motivo que necesita la ayuda y poder revocar algunos cuartos y mejorar un poco su vivienda ya que necesita mejoras para poder vivir sin incomodidades, con el trabajo que realiza de electricista, le alcanza solo para poder alimentar a la familia y el no cuenta con el dinero inmediato para poder disponer en dichas ampliaciones, lo cual solo le permite cancelar en cuotas el monto requerido la zona en la que viven esta muy alejada de la ciudad y no existe transporte publico y cuando llueve los caminos se vuelven intransitables pero lo rescatable de esta familia es que son muy trabajadores.
texts.en: Sandro is married and has three children. He and his family, with a lot of hard work and after living for years in rented accommodation, have managed to buy a piece of land situated to the north of the city, about 45 minutes away from it. Now, Sandro is working hard to provide his family with better living conditions, making improvements to the rooms where they live. It is for this reason that he needs help to plaster and whitewash some rooms and make some small improvements to their home, as it is in need of repair so that they can live there comfortably. With the income from his work as an electrician, Sandro only has enough to feed his family. This means that he does not have the money available to be able to make these improvements. The only way is to pay off the amount that he needs in installments. The district where they live is a long way from the city and there is no public transport, and when it rains the roads are impassable; but what redeems this family is the fact that they are very hard working.

loans.use: to refurbish his home.

loans.name: Gilberto Emeregildo

texts.es:
GILBERTO tiene 54 años de edad de estado civil actual unión libre tiene dos hijos vive con la esposa y con los hijos en el Recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas Provincia de Los Ríos. 

Pertenece a la Ventanilla LOS AMIGOS se encuentra ubicada el  recinto ZAPOTAL NUEVO  , perteneciente al cantón Ventanas se dedica a labores agrícolas y pecuarias. 
 
GILBERTO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maiz y la crianza de animales de corral como pollos y patos. Con el crédito podrá comprar insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, insecticidas para evitar las plagas y enfermedades, ademas alimento para los animales balanceado. Las compras las realiza en la ciudad de Ventanas. 

El sueño es comprar un terreno, en los tiempos libres le gusta jugar boli.
texts.en:
Gilberto is 54 years old and in a civil union.  He has two children, and he lives with his wife and children in the rural community of Zapotal Nuevo in the Ventanas canton of the Los Ríos province.

He belongs to Los Amigos ("The Friends") community bank, which is located in the rural community of Zapotal Nuevo in the Ventanas canton.  Its members make their living in agricultural work and livestock.  Gilberto makes his living in agriculture, cultivating corn and raising barnyard animals such as chickens and ducks.

With the loan, he will be able to buy inputs such as:  fertilizers, manure, insecticides to avoid plagues and diseases, as well as balanced feed for the animals.  He will make the purchases in the city of Ventanas.  His dream is to buy some land.  In his free time, he likes to play volleyball.

loans.use: fertilizers, manure, insecticides to avoid plagues and disease, and balanced feed for the animals.

loans.name: Elber

texts.es: El joven Elber tiene 19  años de edad estado civil soltero actualmente vive conjuntamente con sus padres, pero económicamente es independiente, se dedica a la actividad agrícola produce papa, locoto, zapallo con rotación de cultivos en terreno de 2 Has que es herencia de sus padres, tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro, la comunidad de Corani Pampa se encuentra a 72 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba, el joven Elber necesita dinero de urgencia para comprar insumos agrícolas abono orgánico, productos agroquímicos, los cultivos de locoto tiene que abonar y el tratamiento fitosanitario así garantizar la seguridad alimentaria y la economía, con el ahorro que tenía dio un adelanto a su padre del terreno agrícola, posteriormente construirá su propia casa y formar la familia que es uno de los sueños.
texts.en: Elber is a young man of 19. He is single and lives with his parents at the moment. He is, however, financially independent. He works in agriculture, growing potatoes, locoto chillies and pumpkins, in rotation, on 2 hectares of land, which is an inheritance of his parents. He has a lot of experience in this business. The community of Corani Pampa is 72 km away from Cochabamba. Elber needs urgent funds to buy agricultural supplies, organic fertilizer and agricultural chemicals. The chilli fields need to be fertilized and treated with pesticides to guarantee enough food and secure their financial security. Elber paid his savings to his father as an advance on the land. Later he will build his own house and start a family, which is one of his dreams.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Carmen Pilar

texts.es:
Carmen Pilar tiene 54 años de edad es casada, vive con el esposo no tiene hijos vive en el Recinto Caimito en el Cantón Ventanas.

La ventanilla  LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBRES  se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto el Caimito 1, perteneciente al cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto siembre de maíz y arroz.

Carmen Pilar se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz.  Las Compras y las ventas lo hace en ventanas.

El crédito solicito para la compra de semillas, insumos, fertilizantes, urea, ranger  para la siembra del maíz,   El préstamo ha sido de mucha utilidad para adquirir los productos agrìcolas para las siembras y poder tener un buen cultivo para obtener ingresos para la familia. El sueño  es ver que haya una mejora en los cultivos al momento de venderlos. Los desafìos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia.
En los tiempos libres le gusta leer la Biblia.
texts.en:
Carmen Pilar, 54, is married and has no children.  She lives with her husband in the Caimito area of Ventanas Canton.  La Verdad Nos Hará Libres Communal Bank is located in the Caimito 1 area of Ventanas Canton.  This bank works in short-cycle agriculture, growing corn and rice.

Carmen Pilar makes a living in agriculture growing corn and rice.  She makes her purchases and sales in Ventanas.

She's requesting the loan to buy seeds, supplies, fertilizer, urea, and Ranger [herbicide] to grow corn.  The loan has been very useful for acquiring agricultural products for planting and being able to have a good crop to earn income for the family.

Her dream is to see that there's an improvement in the crops when it comes time to sell them.  The challenge she faces is competition.  In her free time she likes to read the Bible.

loans.use: to buy seeds, supplies, fertilizer, urea, and herbicide

loans.name: Emiliana

texts.es: La Señora Emiliana tiene 37 años estado civil soltera, vive con sus padres pero  económicamente es independiente se dedica al comercio de papa. Compra en la feria de Colomi los días jueves de los agricultores para llevar a vender a trópico Ivirgarzama donde tiene mercado consolidado, realiza esta actividad más de 6 años. La  Sra. Emiliana necesita capital de operación para comercio de papa, el ahorro que tenía invirtió en la compra de un lote de terreno para vivienda. La Sra. Emiliana nos comenta que estaba con poco capital para el comercio, con el préstamo comprará más cantidad de papa para comercio, tendrá para ahorrar para construir su propia casa que es uno de los sueños tener vivienda propia.
texts.en: Mrs. Emiliana is 37 years old, she is single, lives with her parents but is financially independent, and she sells potatoes. She buys her items at the Colomi marketplace every Thursday from farmers to sell at the Ivirgarzama tropic where she has a stall; she has been in business for over 6 years. Mrs. Emiliana needs capital to buy and sell potatoes, as her savings were used to buy a lot of land to build a home. Mrs. Emiliana says that she has small capital for her business and the loan will help her buy more potatoes to sell. She will have to save to build her own home since that is one of her dreams.

loans.use: buy potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Lilian Yanet

texts.es:
La socia Lilian pertenece al banco comunal “Perú”,la socia continua con su negocio de venta de ropa de segundo uso,la socia vende de forma ambulatoria ofreciendo su mercaderia a sus amistades,vecinos entre otros,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia,la socia a la vez viaja cada cierto tiempo al pais de Bolivia para compra su mercaderia,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma poder seguir poayando a su familia.

 
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia para su negocio como casacas para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Lilian is a member of the “Perú” community bank. She continues to sell used clothing, which she sells door-to-door to her friends, neighbors, and others. 

Lilian is a responsible and diligent person, which is how she is able to support her family. She travels to Bolivia every once in a while to buy merchandize. She has been working in this business for a long time, which is successful thanks to the effort she puts in to it every day. Lilian wants to continue working in order to continue supporting her family. 

She is requesting this loan to buy merchandize such as jackets for her business.

Lilian is grateful for the opportunity afforded to her by Kiva lenders and vows to respect the repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as jackets for her business.

loans.name: Nicolas

texts.es: El señor Nicolás tiene 54 años de edad vive con sus 4 hijos, la esposa le abandono hace 13 años, él y sus hijos son agricultores producen papa, papaliza, oca cultivan en un terreno de 2.8 Has que es herencia de sus padres  tiene mucha experiencia en el rubro, ellos se encuentran en la comunidad de Kuri mayu a 75 km de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Nicolás nos comenta que sus hijos quieren vivir en una casa cómoda, la casa que tiene es rustico y para ello necesitan dinero, un préstamo para la construcción de vivienda, el ahorro que tenía  lo invirtió en los insumos agrícolas porque este año juntamente con sus hijos sembraron en más superficie la papa, su sueño es dar una vida digna a sus hijos, estudio y una vivienda cómoda, en la zona no existe los servicio básicos.
texts.en: Mr. Nicolás is 54 years old; he lives with his 4 children as his wife left him 13 years ago. Mr. Nicolás and his children are farmers, they grow potatoes, ulloco, and oca in 2.8 hectares of land since it is an inheritance from his parents and he has a lot of experience in the field. The place is located in the Kuri mayu community, some 75 km. from the city of Cochabamba.  Mr. Nicolás says that his children would like to live in a comfortable home, where they live now is rustic and they need money. The loan will be used to build a home; his savings were used for agricultural products because this year with his children they planted more potatoes. Mr. Nicolás’ dream is to give his children a dignified life, an education and a comfortable home, the area where they live in has no necessary infrastructure.

loans.use: build a home.

loans.name: Norma Isabel

texts.es:
La socia Norma pertenece al banco comunal “Mi Perú”,la socia continua con sus estudios de obstetricia y en sus ratos libres administra el negocio familiar ,el negocio es una libreria donde venden cuadernos, lapiceros, folderes, papeles,plumones entre otros,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante.

La socia solicita el credito para la compra de mercaderia para su negocio como papeles,cuadernos,libros entre otros.  

La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Norma belongs to the communal bank "Mi Peru" (My Peru).  She continues with her Obstetric studies and in her free time works in her family business.  The business is a bookstore where she sells notebooks, pencil cases, folders, paper, pens, and other things.  She has spent a lot of time in this business, and it is going well thanks to her determination each day.  

Norma is a responsible, persevering person and this has helped her move forward.  She is applying for this loan to buy merchandise for her business such as paper, notebooks, and books among other things.  She feels thankful for the opportunity given to her, and she is committed to making the payments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business such as paper, notebooks, and books among other things.

loans.name: Rosendo

texts.es: El señor Rosendo tiene 34 años, vive con su  esposa, tienen 3 hijos que dependen de ellos. Una de sus hijas esta cursando  sexto de primaria, su otro hijo tiene 5 años y se encuentra cursando el Kínder  y el menor todavía es un bebe. El y su esposa se dedican a la cría de ganado porcino y producción de maiz. El diario vivir del señor Rosendo es muy sacrificado y agotador ya que son varias actividades que tiene que atencionar.   Los ingresos que obtienen no son suficientes para proporcionar una buena alimentación  de su familia, por ese motivo el tomo la decisión de solicitar un crédito para  invertir en la compra de insumos para preparar alimento balanceado de los cerdos y  así poder ahorrar un poco en los gastos y de esta manera tener mejores ingresos que le permitan mejorar la condición de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Rosendo is 34 years old, lives with his wife, and has three dependent children.  One of his daughters is in the sixth grade, his other son is five years old and is in kindergarten, and the youngest is still a baby.  He and his wife raise pigs and farm corn.  Rosendo's daily routine is very demanding and exhausting as there are various activities that require his attention.  The income that he makes isn't sufficient to provide a good diet for his family, so he has decided to apply for a loan to invest in purchasing supplies to prepare a balanced diet for the pigs.  This will allow him to save a little in his expenses and to have a better income that will help him to better the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy supplies to prepare a balanced diet.

loans.name: Adrían De Jesús

texts.es: Adrian de 28 años es casado y tiene tres hijos menores de edad, la mayor parte de su vida se dedicó a la recolección de café en diferentes departamentos de Colombia. Su familia preocupada por la situación de desplazarse de un lugar para otro sin saber que necesidades le tocaba afrontar en el día a día, decidieron apoyarlo para que montara un granero, suministrándole el capital inicial y prestándole un garaje. Adrian montó su negocio y con él ha podido sostener a su familia. Desea poder adquirir un préstamo para comprar surtido y realizar mejoras locativas, con el fin de generar ingresos y darles a sus hijos educación y una mejor calidad de vida. Su mayor sueño es poder ver a su familia feliz sin carencias económicas
texts.en: Adrian is 28 years old, is married and has three children who are underage, most of his life was dedicated to picking coffee in different departments in Colombia. His family was worried as he was displaced from place to place without knowing what troubles he would face day to day, that is why they decided to support him to set up a convenience store and supplying him with the starting capital and lending him a garage. Adrian started his business and with it he has been able to support his family. He hopes to have a loan to stock his business and make improvements to the store to increase his income and give his children a better education and quality of life. Adrian’s biggest dream is to see his family happy without any financial difficulties.

loans.use: buy basic household goods and make improvements to his store.

loans.name: Ana Lucía

texts.es: Para salir adelante sólo se necesitan ganas. La motivación, la disciplina y la entrega han hecho que Ana Lucía de 22 años de edad no se rinda y luche por su futuro. Con las ayuda de su madre logró montar una miscelánea en la que ofrece servicios de fax, escáner y fotocopias. La situación económica que afronta su familia ha sido el mayor motor para ella, dice que lo más importante para ella es su madre y que mientras exista luchará por verla sonreír, asegura que su discapacidad no es un limitante si no por el contrario una motivación para hacer mejor las cosas. En la actualidad se encuentra solicitando un crédito con el que espera comprar una fotocopiadora, para mejorar la calidad del servicio y generar mayores ingresos.
texts.en: All you need to get ahead is will power.  Motivation, self-discipline and dedication are what 22 year old Ana Lucía never runs out of; she keeps fighting for her future.  With the help of her mother, she has managed to set-up a corner shop, selling fax, scanning and photocopying services.  The financial situation that her family is facing is her biggest driver.  Most important for Ana Lucía is her mother - she will never stop fighting to see her smile.  She says that her disability does not stop her but rather it motivates her to do things better.  She is currently seeking a loan to buy a photocopier, in order to improve her level of service and to generate a higher income.

loans.use: to buy a photocopier.

loans.name: Luz Mrina

texts.es: Luz Marina continúa en el banco comunal “Señor del Calvario” y con la venta de maíz y otros granos secos. Ya son 5 a 6 años que se dedica al negocio y le va muy bien.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar habas y maíz. Agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Luz Marina continunes to be with the “Señor del Calvario” communal bank and selling corn and other dried grains. She has had this business for 5 or 6 years and it has gone well for her. At this time, she needs the loan to buy beans and corn. She is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments according to the schecule.

loans.use: to buy beans and corn.

loans.name: Julia Mabel

texts.es: Julia continúa en el banco comunal “Señor del Calvario” y con la venta de productos de primera necesidad como son arroz, azúcar, leche, harinas, fideos, mazamorras, huevos y entre otros. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo sacos de arroz, sacos de azúcar y entre otros. Agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en: Julia continues as a member of the community bank “Señor del Calvario”, and with the sale of staple food stuffs such as rice, sugar, milk, flours, noodles, maize porridge and eggs, among other things. On this occasion Julia needs the loan to buy stock, for example, sacks of rice and sacks of sugar and other products. She is grateful for the loan and she promises to pay the installments according to the payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy stock, for example, sacks of rice and sacks of sugar and other products.

loans.name: Edgar Javier

texts.es: Edgar de 49 años de edad se ha dedicado a laborar desde hace 10 años con desechables en diferentes negocios de Itagüí, Colombia. Su jefe le planteó la posibilidad de que se convirtiera en socio de su negocio y Edgar aceptó de inmediato la oferta, invirtiendo sus ahorros. En la actualidad Edgar es el propietario y desea mejorar la oferta y la calidad en el servicio, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito para la compra de desechables, salsas, insumos de comidas rápidas y cereales. Su mayor deseo es poder generar mayores ingresos que  le permitan mejorar su calidad de vida, y tener la oportunidad de expandir su negocio para generar empleos en su municipio.
texts.en:
Edgar is 49 years old, and has made a living working with disposable items in different businesses in Itagüí, Colombia for the last 10 years.

His boss suggested the possibility of him becoming a partner in his business. Edgar immediately accepted and invested his savings. Today, Edgar is the owner and wants to improve the range and quality of service. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy disposable items, sauces, supplies for fast food and cereals.

His biggest dream is to generate higher revenues enabling him to improve his quality of life, and have the opportunity to expand his business to create jobs in his town.

loans.use: to buy disposable items, sauces, supplies for fast food and cereals

loans.name: Francisco Luis

texts.es: Francisco de 48 años de edad, vive en el municipio de Bello, Antioquia, Colombia, en donde tiene una legumbrería, la cual es su única fuente de ingresos para su familia compuesta por su esposa y su hijo de 9 años de edad. Todos los días se levanta muy temprano y comienza su faena. Se dirige a la plaza de mercado en donde realiza las compras de la fruta y la legumbre que comercializa en su barrio, luego abre su negocio y labora hasta las 8 de la noche. Su mayor sueño es poder adecuar su negocio y posicionarlo en el mercado de su sector con el fin de generar mejores ingresos que le permitan mejorar la condición de vida en su hogar. Por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito para comprar mayor surtido y mejorar su portafolio de productos.
texts.en:
Francisco is 48 years old, lives in the town of Bello, Antioquia, Colombia, and has a fruit and vegetable store.

This is his only source of income for his family; his wife and their nine-year old child. Every day, he gets up very early and starts work. He goes to the market square where he buys the fruits and vegetables that he sells in his neighborhood, and then opens his store and works until eight in the evening. 

His biggest dream is to adapt his business and move it to his neighborhood's market in order to make more profit, enabling him to improve living conditions in his home. 

That is why he is requesting a loan to buy more stock and expand his product portfolio.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es:
La socia Nilda pertenece al banco comunal “Mi Perú”,la socia continua dedicandose al negocio de venta de menudencia de pollo y res como tambien continua viajando cada fin de semana a su ciudad natal para vender su mercaderia,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio,a la vez la socia continua dedicandose el resto de los dias al cuidado de su hogar,la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma poder seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de menudencia de pollo y res para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por la oportunidad brindada mediante este medio y así mismo se compromete a cumplir con el pago correspondiente al cronograma.
texts.en:
Nilda belongs to the “Mi Perú” (My Peru) communal bank. She still makes a living selling chicken and cow parts and still travels to her place of birth to sell her goods every weekend.

She has worked in this business for years, which is successful thanks to the effort that she puts into it every day. She also continues to do her housework on the other days of the week. She hopes to continue working in order to continue supporting her family.

Nilda is requesting this loan to buy chicken and cow parts for her business. 

Nilda is grateful for the opportunity the loan provides and is committed to making her repayments as scheduled.

loans.use: to buy chicken and cow parts for her business.

loans.name: Cornelia

texts.es:
Cornelia continúa en el banco comunal  “Señor del Calvario”, con la compra y venta de verduras y frutas. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad  requiere el préstamo para comprar frutas como naranjas, papayas, plátanos, mango y entre otros.  

Cornelia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Cornelia continues to be a part of the “Señor del Calvario” communal bank, and to buy and sell vegetables and fruits. She has been in her business for several years and is doing quite well. At present she needs a loan to buy fruits like oranges, papayas, plantains, mango, and other foodstuffs.

Cornelia is grateful for the loan and is committed to meeting her payment quotas according to the time specified.

loans.use: buy fruits like oranges, papayas, plantains, mango, and other foodstuffs.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria continua en el banco comunal “Señor del Calvario”, con la crianza de animales menores como  cuyes, pollos y ovinos y con la venta de chicha de jora y cerveza. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar patos, cuyes, gallinas, chanchos y pollos. 

Victoria agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Victoria continues as a member of the "Señor del Calvario" communal bank, raising small animals such as guinea pigs, chickens and sheep, and also selling chicha de jora (Peruvian corn beer) and beer.

She has worked in this business for several years now, and it is going very well. On this occasion she needs the loan to buy ducks, guinea pigs, hens, pigs and chickens.

Victoria is grateful for the loan, and promises to make her installment payments in accordance with the repayment schedule.

loans.use: To buy ducks, guinea pigs, hens, pigs and chickens.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal SANTO DOMINGO,el banco se encuentra ubicado en el distrito de Cusco,provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.
La socia Luz Marina tiene 50 años de edad ,la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes,la socia vende lo que son productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,leche entre otros,la socia trabaja de lunes a sabado durante el dia,la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada dia a su negocio siendo de esta forma que la socia sale adelante.
La socia solicita el credito para la compra de gaseosas para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el credito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the Santo Domingo communal bank; it is located in the Cusco district, province of Cusco, department of Cusco.

Luz Marina is 50 years old, she alternates daily activities with her grocery store, and she sells basic household goods like rice, sugar, milk and other items. She works Monday to Saturday during the day. She has been in this business for many years and has done quite well thanks to the dedication that she puts each day since it is her means to get a better quality of life.

The member needs the loan to buy refreshments for her business.

The member is grateful for the loan and is committed to meeting all of her payment quotas.

loans.use: buy refreshments for her business.

loans.name: Brizonia Maria

texts.es:
BRIZONIA MARIA tiene 27 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene cuatro hijos, vive con el conyugue y los hijos en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los rìos.

Es integrante de la Vrc LA VERDAD NOS HARA LIBBRE, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto caimito 1, pertenece al Cantón Pueblo viejo, Los miembros de esta Ventanilla se dedican a labores agrícolas y pecuarias.

BRIZONIA MARIA se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar fertilizantes, urea, semillas, líquido mata plagas, ranger. 

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá adquirir estos insumos agrícolas que tanta falta le hace para las siembras. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas en las plantas. El sueño es comprar terrenos y una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta realizar los quehaceres domésticos.
texts.en:
Brizonia Maria is 27 years old; she is in a common law marriage and has four children. She lives with her partner and children in the city of Ventanas, province of Los Rios.

She is a member of “The Truth Will Set Us Free” communal bank, located in the Caimito 1 area, part of the Pueblo Viejo neighborhood. The members are in agriculture and in cattle raising.

Brizonia Maria is in agriculture and grows corn and rice. She needs a loan to buy fertilizers, urea, seeds, liquid plague killer, and ranger (a type of herbicide).

With the loan she will be able to buy the agricultural products that she needs for her crops. The challenges that she faces are plagues on her plants. Brizonia Maria’s dream is to buy land and a home. During her free time she enjoys doing household chores.

loans.use: buy fertilizers, urea, seeds, liquid plague killer, and ranger.

loans.name: Osvaldo

texts.es: El señor Osvaldo tiene 46 años de edad estado civil viudo hace 7 años vive con sus 3 hijos, la actividad económica es servicio de filmación de video realiza para todo acontecimiento social (matrimonios, cumpleaños, promociones, bautizos y otros) Colomi  se encuentran a 49 km. de la ciudad de Cochabamba. Osvaldo nos comenta que necesita dinero para la construcción de muralla de su vivienda, el ahorro que tenía  lo invirtió en la mejora de su vivienda obra fina y le falto dinero para terminar la muralla de su casa, Don Osvaldo trabaja y ahorra dinero para dar mejores condiciones de vida a sus 3 hijos que están estudiando en nivel secundaria él nos comenta que su sueño es ver a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en: Osvaldo is 46 years old, and has been a widower for 7 years. He lives with his 3 children. He has a business making videos at all kinds of social functions (weddings, birthdays, promotional events, christenings and others). Colomi is 49 km. away from the city of Cochabamba. Osvaldo tells us that he needs money to build a wall around his house. He has invested the savings that he had, in home improvements, doing the finishing work. He does not have the money to finish the wall around his house. Osvaldo works and saves money to improve the living conditions of his three children, who are studying at secondary school level. He tells us that his dream is to see that his children all become professional people.

loans.use: to build a wall around his house.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.es:
Verónica tiene 33 años de edad, tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos, ella nació en la hermosa ciudad del Cusco pero vive en la misma ciudad donde nació, ella viaja cada cierto tiempo  a la ciudad de calca para las reuniones del banco comunal. Su actividad económica es ayudar a su mama en la molinera.  Ya son varios años que ayuda en el negocio y le va muy bien pero en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar un carrito sanguchero para así independizarse pues desea tener su propio negocio.

Verónica agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Verónica is 33 years old. She is in a common law marriage and has two children. She was born in the beautiful city of Cuzco and lives there still. She travels periodically to the city of Calca for the communal bank meetings. Her economic activity is helping her mother at the mill. She has been helping in the business for several years but at this times needs a loan to buy a sandwich cart so she can go off on her own, because she wants her own business. 

Verónica is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments according to the schedule.

loans.use: to buy a sandwich cart.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia nació en la ciudad del Cusco pero vive en la ciudad de Urubamba, ella tiene 51 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella es una madre trabajadora que saca adelante a sus hijos pues su actividad económica principal es la venta de verduras en uno de los mercados populares de dicha ciudad. Ya son 21 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño en su trabajo. En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mas mercadería como cebollas, zanahorias, zapallos y entre otras.  Virginia agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Virginia, 51, was born in the city of Cusco but lives in Urubamba.  She has a common-law relationship from which she has four children.  She's a hardworking mother who gets her children ahead.

Her main job is selling vegetables in one of Urubamba's popular markets.  She has made a living for 21 years already in this business and it's going very well for her thanks to the effort she puts into her job.

She needs this loan to buy onions, carrots, pumpkins, and other merchandise.

Virginia is grateful for the loan and committed to making her payments in accordance with the schedule.

loans.use: to buy onions, carrots, pumpkins, and other merchandise

loans.name: Marizza

texts.es: Marizza continúa en el banco comunal “Señor del Calvario”, con la compra y venta de ropa y zapatos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa al por mayor y menor. Ya son varios años que se dedica este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  En esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como zapatos y ropa para campaña por año nuevo. Marizza agradece el préstamo y se compromete  a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de acuerdo al cronograma de pagos.
texts.en:
Marizza continues to be a member of the "Señor del Calvario" communal bank, buying and selling clothing and shoes. 

She is requesting the loan to invest in buying wholesale and retail clothing. She has made a living with this business for many years, and is doing very well with it thanks to the effort she puts into her work.  

This time, she needs the loan to buy merchandize such as shoes and clothing for the new year season. Marizza is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments in accordance with the payment plan.

loans.use: to buy merchandize such as shoes and clothing for the new year season.
